It is a decent place to eat and pocket friendly too. The thali which costs about 50 rupees is the most demanded here by the students living nearby and it gives you a sort of home like food, so its worth a try if you are looking for a monthly basis meal plan. i personally liked the butter masala paneer here which was about 80 for half plate, it was cooked with due care. However i would advise against eating chicken and egg here as they did not seem to be fresh.

One of my uncles took us to this hidden gem. This place is a located in a community club. Food is amazing. Tried their veg n non-veg platter. Their mutton seekh kebab is jus the best... simply mesmerising... and jus melts in ur mouth. Definetely coming here for more

I think the food is pretty great for the price. I have had the PIRI PIRI chicken pizza, the PIRI PIRI chicken special burger, the Paneer Malai Tikka  and what not. Everything tasted brilliant. And the bill! It will surprise you! It's too light on the pocket and you will NOT regret ordering from here. The delivery,too, is pretty fast. :)Never been to the actual place, but I order quite frequently. Must Order From My Side. :D
I always like to dine here, one of my all time favorite restaurant. My kids too love this place.The food is filling and amazing. Will plan my next visit soon.
Rajdhani.....one of the best place to enjoy rajasthani thali with lots of variety they serve that comes with complimentary drink that is lassi.
Horrible service response. Extremely rude to customers. Should be taught how to deal with customers politely on the phone and not be abrupt and slam the phone.
A nice ambience, homely veg food which is also delicious like heaven ! A big thumbs up to this restaurant to all veggies out there. Courteous staff adds more charm. Kudos !

DELICIOUS AUTHENTIC FOOD IN ELEGANT AMBIENCE. You forget you are in India when you enter this place. They offer a big range in food that can be enjoyed by anyone and still is priced reasonably. A gem. My wife ate here with her friends today, including a Japanese, who frequently visits it and loves it.
Very cute! Very authentic... Really nice japanese food. Experiment and you won't be disappointed. But not the place for the best sushi, so have an open mind.
Ordered Linzer torte, apple crumble and sourdough, pumpernickel bread. The first three were superlative, awesome even. The pumpernickel was raw in the middle.

This place is opposite to my office and it's the ideal place to have lunch from when you don't get your tiffin... I had bought these - 1) bengan ka bharta 2) rajma 3) chole 4) paneer 5) kofta 6) dal you can get sabzi for min of Rs20. their rotis are soft and good. Their thali is for Rs 50 and really good. Students and office people come here and have their lunch...

Went here today, saw it by chance on the way to gurgaon and stopped to try.. Turn out the taste is as. Good as the original, the staff who attends to you at the car could have more practice.. But food quality was amazing and  best of all its closer to gurgaon!!

Yuckkk is the word. Yuck yuck yuck. It is a big blot on its original SDA. Tried it about a month and a half ago & had to take my son to the nursing home for food poisoning. This after having re-confirming the sales guy that all food was fresh. Decided to never visit any aap ki khatir joint.
Best place to have healthy food to make your diet best in worth prices. I love their chicken sandwich and chicken tikka roll. The best part is it is full of taste and healthy also.
Virgin mojito was very refreshing, the presentation was seemingly beautiful, with a good ambience and well behaved staff members.

i visited both the outlet in satya Niketan as well hudson lane the food was amazing their. i had their  veg platter - 4/5 cheesy fries - 4.5/5 chilli garlic noodles - 5/5 dessert - 5/5 ambience - 4/5  budget friendly too

Was here with my friends, absolutely cute ambience to chill.Had their amazing carnivore platter and fish finger with some amazing coolers. Would recommend this place for their reasonable price platters
I have tried here herbivorous platter the presentation is good and the taste is also amazing

This place is warm with hospitable staff...the food is a little indianised version of Asian food, however everything is full of flavour and you end up enjoying due to great service.  Should try the baos and sushi, the California sushi, roast duck Bao, patty Bao.

Have been to the fatty boa outlets at Delhi and Bombay, and it has never been a disappointment. Those who like a good sangria might just find one here. The food and the ambience both are a good reason to visit the place time and again. The Japanese cheese cake deserves a special mention.
Great baos and overall a very good menu with lots of good options. place is also nice. Warm staff. want to pop in for a meal every time I pass Sangam.

Teriyaki Glazed Chicken Bao is the yummiest and the softest open bao I‚Äôve ever had! You get the full deal here because of the perfect blend of flavours. And FYI these buns are STEAMED.   It is also one of the only few restaurants that serve Oysters!

Had a really bad experience.   Food wise I don‚Äôt think they live up to the ratings mentioned on Zomato. Food was just average. Service was not great. The guy serving us was clueless and lost most of the time.   They have an extensive alcohol menu but nothing is available when asked for. Literally 70% of it is not available. They had 0/7 beers listed on the menu. And every spirit we asked for had 1/3 brands available.   Really disappointed by the overall experience.

As we were craving some south Indian dishes we went to this restaurant, the place is very crowded at lunchtime as it is famous for its dosa. so after a long wait, we got the table for two. we both ordered masala dosa, sambhar was very tasty and all above this  I liked the coconut chutney which tastes heaven, talking about the inside masala it was also good, the sides of the dosa were crispy and crunchy so overall you can visit this place if you crave a proper south India food.
Visited this with my friends. Nice place to have authentic Indian food. Overall loved the experience.
Amazing experience here. Loved the food and the service. The dosa tastes amazing. Will surely visit again.
On a Sunday I visited this place and I got nachos and it was so good and crispy. Burger was so good and juicy and huge. Crispy french fries.¬† Quick service. I highly recommend this place.

A friend suggested me this restaurant and couple of days ago I visited this restaurant finally. Nice and vibrant ambiance and well decorated. Seating is cosy.¬† Everything here is good and worth your money.
Visited this place and we seated quickly. We ordered couple of dishes which were.... chicken burger pepperoni pizza Both were so good and yummy.
In recent i went to this restaurant for dinner and it was a delightful experience. Vibrant environment. Pasta was so good and super tasty. Prompt service and friendly staff.

This place is famous in satyaniketan and is perfect to spend time with friends and family. I recently ordered kathi roll and chilly chicken from this place and it was so delicious. The food served was piping hot and fresh, staff was polite and the ambiance was good. You must visit this place.

If you're looking for a place to party, then this surely is your place! I love the ambience and aesthetics of the place. The other day I went with a bunch of friends after college and the food was amazing here. Also good music makes everything ten times worth. This place surely is value for money. Totally recommended!!!

The menu is so elaborate and interesting , i wanted to try everything but decided on ordering chilly chicken, tandoori paneer sandwich and double cheese burger Everything was delectable and presented so nicely‚Äô the preparation time was also very quick and the staff is very polite and helpful! The place has a great vibe with beautiful interiors and easily accessible location. Quantity is more than enough at such price! Highly recommended!!
This is an amazing place to hangout with friends and family. I loved the ambience of the place. I ordered honey chilly potato and cheese cups. They both were amazing in taste. Loved the food.

superstar cafe is a small but decent cafe in the streets of staya niketan.On the go offer would attract you even more. The place is comfortable enough for a gathering of 20 people.  perks of going to *SUPERSTAR CAFE* -you get good service,excellent food,healthy environment and the best thing is ambience May be the taste of some dishes like pasta and hakka noodles fall back but the place stands a score of 8 out of 10 for comforts, 8 out of 10 for food, 10/10 for service and 7/10 for its location
The ambience of superstarcafe is little different from otherswich are in satya niketanarea. It has a unique vibe in its own. Food is good too. You can also try north indian. Its good.
Amazing place to hangout with friends.
I went to superstar cafe on my birthday and it wasn't upto my expectations.. Also, the food was quite normal if I compare it with other cafes in satyaniketan..

What an absolutely delightful dining experience. We did not know anything about this place but actually had come just to see the mall. The staff was very polite, knowledgeable and adhered to all our requests of spice and ingredients. Great ambience.. not loud, and winter seatings near the window are perfect. Would love to return
Yummy Food Awesome place
Visited this place with my family . Ordered soup , starters and main course dishes. Everything was perfect , the food tastes so good , thanks to the chef. Good experience

The feta cheese focaccia is their way of selling flat bread pizza. It was utterly delicious. Also have their yam galauti kebabs with dal makhani and makabar parantha. The veg food is as good as the non veg food üå∏. This is my go to place. Love the ambiance. Love the vibe. Love the food.

QRO by dark house cafe Introduced to me by a friend and god am I greatful for find this sweet spot to eat the food is just amazing i have been here multiple times and this place never disappoints love the whole vibe of this place and I enjoy every visit I have here Though I did like the previous theme to the cafe but the new one isn't bad either It in line with a lot of other cafes and I have tried quiet a few of them but by far this one just stands out to me. Period A must visit Recommendations Green apple/Virgin mojito Pasta and the shakes And the best part it's really really affordable

This is my favorite cafe in Satya niketan. Whenever I visit satya niketan, I don't need to think that in which cafe I have to go. I have tried their veg Chinese platter, which was awesome. All the dishes were fresh and good in taste. And I also ordered margarita pizza and red Bull. This turns out to be a perfect combination for me. Totally satisfied.
The food was delicious. It's not much spacious and work can be done on decorating the cafe. It's reasonable and the staff is really nice. I celebrated my birthday
I ordered white sauce pasta, chilli garlic noodles and veg Manchurian...all were good... Service was nice... And the prices are affordable.... Good place to hangout with friends....

Went to Cafe Hera Pheri a couple of times. I'd say the food is tasty but the prices are quite high. I ordered noodles and a Oreo shake and I have to pay a 1000 bucks for that . The food compensates it though. Also the staff is okay though they need to standardize their services.
They have a really colourful ambience and courteous staff. Mushroom thyme soup is the really creamy and delicious. Their oreo shake and sandwiches are also worth a try.

Cafe is for hukkah lovers, As there were no special food item which i have to mention here..  though the food items was ordered, the result was good in taste and nice presentation.. but i have written in many reviews of satyaniketan outlets that the music system which they have installed in their cafes are so loud that leads to create irritation. Though i love this place and service was good, hukkah was good, all food items were good.. total recommended place for hukkah lovers..

I ordered barbeque wings, fried rice and two drinks. Well, wings literally sucked but fried rice was okay. Service was good but the food was not as delicious as I thought it would be. And the ambience was okay. But I will not recommend this cafe to anyone as there are many other cafes in Satya which are way better than this.
Pasta and platter was so good (5/5) Plus their dip was so flavoursome (5/5) Didn't loved the ambience though (2.5/5) Service was also slow Recommended just for the food

pipeline Cafe in Satyaniketan in front of the Venky college of Delhi university is one of the most popular hangout spots out of all the other 50 cafes in the area. The staff and manager are really polite and service is extra good. The take steps like replacing your food in case you don't like it. Customer satisfaction is a really important thing and Pipeline caf√© Takes all possible steps to provide it. My favourite items :- 1) Spring rolls 2)Penne Pasta(i prefer the mix sauce oneüòç) 3)Oreo shake 4) Chocolate brownie shake(BEST I've had ever) 5)vegetable cheese sandwiches awesome with red chutney 6)barbeque Paneer tikka 8)Chilly patato Oh and did i mention they have a separate big area to dance with a dedicated DJ? What are you waiting for Go and pay a visit
This cafe serves very good and tasty food. It's fried rice and noodles were delicious and spicy. The ambience was also very good. It has a Place to dance as well. This place is so good to visit.

An average place to be honest and this is  just a feedback as a customer .... It isn't famous for anything in particular in regards to food or alcohol... The ambience are very regular and the restrooms are far from impressive ...  The place could still be doing well and not taking anything away from the people trying to run it ...
This is said to be one of the best chinese combination of all time.  The best comfort food.
The desert we ordered was so yummy. We had chocolate truffle sundae (The valley of flowers). It was amazing. Must visit.

If you are looking for pocket friendly food then this is one of the best option to try in satyaniketan.¬† I have not visted here so cant comment on interiors and ambience.¬† Order many times from here for home delivery and all time they have served on time with hot and fresh food.

Some days ago i went to here . i had one pizza one cold coffee and grilled chaap . pizza is so yummm. i like their interior. There music and sitting place is good. i would to prefer to try this place. Lovely place . visit again
This place is a must try for burger lovers!! The way they serve the burger the whole presentation thing is so nice!! Used to be our favorite hangout place after college!!!
Great burger comes with a great taste.. It was awesome.. Great experience... Must try... Specially protein powers... Also go for mad fries.. Reasonable..

My friends told me about this place and I said ok I will try it. I ordered the Grilled Chicken burger and let me tell you it was one of the best burger I have ever tried and the fries are just delicious . This is the best burger place in the area. I am definitely coming back.
Their Nutella Marshmallows Waffle is to die for. A MUST TRY!!! Caramel Brownie shake is also good. All in all it's a pocket friendly place with a good ambience.

A shoutout to all the burger lovers. Even though they don‚Äôt have seating arrangements, but they do have are standing tables and they offer take-away and delivery services.  This much hyped place was on my list for a quite few days, so we decided to pay a visit to the outlet, and it didn‚Äôt disappoint. Burgrill has a strong hold on the range of burgers, but there is still a large variety on their menu. So we decided to order Meaty mighty salad, cheese chicken and cheese mutton burgers, crispy barbeque chicken wrap, pulled barbeque chicken sandwich, bacon chilli and cheeese fries, mozarella cheese sticks. In my recommendation one must try their meaty mighty salad and burgers, which were absolutely mesmerizing. Sandwiches and fries were decent in taste. Mozarella sticks were undoubtedly delicious and cheezy, but I was disappointed with their quantity.  We also oredered Bubble gum cola, fresh ginger mojito, strawberry oreo shake and iced banoffee milkshake. I have to admit that the shakes and drinks were worth the money spent. Absolutely gem !  Good food, curteous staff and quality service, so overall we had a good experience at Burgrill. Cheers !!

Pasta and pizza that i had from this place was mouthwatering it was too tasty and also looked very tasty. Since we all know satyaniketan is a students hanging out space this place here is too good i visited this place when i went delhi and the ambience of this place was too good...

This seemed super creepy...it couldn‚Äôt decide between a sleezy cafe or a really bad escort lounge. No waiters to explain what was happening and all the windows taped up. I didn‚Äôt stay long to see if things improved...I held no hope
I have ordered only one veg pizza, it was not too good, not too bad, the taste was only satisfactory. Ambience was good. I also ordered sheesha, but I was not satisfied with the service.

The service is atrocious. There is no coordination with the zomato company.  They firstly tell us to wait for 30 min becz inka khattam ho gya tha and after 1 hour they cancelled....zomato was saying restro cancelled the order and they were saying zomato cancelled it...... Worst experience ever with this restroüòëüòë I will never gonna order from here again and also doesn't recommend it to anybody
Mutton Keema biryani was delicious! Kutton Keema was very well cooked and spicy! Loved it! Didn't like Hyderbadi veg biryani at all.
Incomplete order delivered. Saalan was missing. Not the first time that this has happened. Multiple instances in the past also.
Singapore Noodles are too yum and the chicken momos are too delicious.

I have eaten a lot from your place and it used to be very different and excellent! Recently, I‚Äôm not sure if you changed staff or whatever happened but you are not great with online orders at all. It doesn‚Äôt have the same quality as when i eat there in the taste. If you don‚Äôt want to go down the drain, please pull up your socks, i loved your food!

This place was good before zomato and swiggy came along. I have been ordering from this place since 2014, they used to add black mushrooms, broccoli to their chicken. The other day when i ordered they gave me chili chicken with onion and green bell pepper. That's it. Nothing else. Literally waste of money
A place in Satya Niketan to fulfil the cravings of Chaat and pav bhaji. Although I didn't like the taste and it was kind of overpriced with respect to the quality.
Horrible delivery and taste both!!
The place was average as I was expecting too much from this place. As the name say Bombay, there was nothing like Bombay. Normal chat normal taste.

An excellent cafe with beautiful ambience and ultra friendly atmosphere. Suits your requirement and fits your pocket as well.  Interior is neatly done with chic lights on the ceiling with comfortable lighting to set up the mood for that intimate rendezvous. Ample seating space which caters for groups as well as for couples. Taste of music is good and lets you have your talks too. Bombay brunch special grilled sandwich and sev puri is a must try and quality of cutting chai is super. The only issue is with the parking space for your four wheeler which is not available. Overall a must visit cafe for all those who like to work from cafes and spend some good time around nice music and food.

It was 7pm on a weekday, I had just stepped out of office when my colleague insisted that we tried Bombay Brunch on our way back to Delhi. As tired as I was, I couldn't refuse to her. And God, do I love her for having took me there?!  We tried their Cheese Dabeli, Paani Puri, Samosa Chaat and Chaat Platter. And believe me, with every bite that I took, I wanted to thank my colleague more. The food was genuinely that good.  Pretty pocket-friendly for a restaurant in Satyaniketan, its located right at the beginning. Hence, saving you the troublel of walking too much as well.  In my opinion, ya'll should definitely go!
This cafe has been shut down . Would request Zomato to Please update your details. Zomato needs to be responsible enough to review places and update accordingly

Small place to hangout with friends comes with good ambience and delicious food. Reasonable pricing of both food and drinks. Food here is tasty and delicious tried fusions in their recipes and nailed it

Well, In the middle¬†of all the restaurant in South Campus. It is a nice one through the sitting and staff is not that good still a good place to chill.¬†Try out for their burgers n momos. Still, you guys can make your menu better the best.
Please do not visit this restaurant nowadays because it is closed under renvovation. You will only get annoyed by doing so. Though nearby restaurants are goodüëç

I was little apprehensive to visit this cafe. And when I went there, I wasn't very glad to see everything in ambience or the crowd (may be bcoz I reach a little early) but liked the wall decor only of engraved bottles in it. Anyways,  what I totally enjoyed here was their food. Food , yes you heard me right ...if you love some Continental & Chinese food then its the place here. However, one can get awesome Afghani Tandoori Momos, which I loved it totally. This place is really cheap and you can get value for money by having great food  here. Would love visiting here and recommend to the loved ones.
The street food is up to the mark but some things are overpriced . Less space to sit but the food is worth it.
I ordered tandoori veg momos and I found hair in the momos which looked very unhygienic. The place should maintain certain hygiene.

I love these place ‚ù§Ô∏è I always knew Chowringhee serves the best rolls but they also serve the best Momos . Paneer tandoori Momos were so crispy their chutney was too good in taste üòãtheir chutney is awesome . Totally worth it to the rates ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è rating - 4.8/5
Good and romantic place. I went with a friend. chicken momos, burger and pasta was so good and creamy. Very generous portion. I will be back to this place again.

If you are looking for a pocket friendly and Good quality of food then this restaurant is better option. I ordered for Veg noodle and Veg Burger.I must say I am amazed by thier service. The full plate of veg noodle is enough for two people's.  veg noodle - 5/4 veg burger- 5/4  will visit again...!!!

A cozy place in the hubble-bubble of Munirka. Serves as a cool hang out place, though not very big and that maybe a good thing. Tried sandwiches and Afghani chicken momos and coffee, all very well made. Pocket friendly and peaceful, makes for a nice evening visit.
Awesome food with great location n frndly staff will give you your space to spend time with your ones.. Each n everything is perfect. U can come any time it alays welcome with u a big smile

Located at metro station Munirka, this place is good enough for some lip smacking fast food options. I tried their chholey bhature twice. The taste was really nice however they're too oily and the oil can be seen running on your plate. Rest, it'd good place comparing to price.
Taste is good. Price is a little higher than it should be. Service is quick. Seating is on benches. Lots of food and beverages options available with Golgappe stall also available.

It's right behind munirka association bus stop. Serves some pocket friendly Chinese foods and North Indian snack varieties. Chole bhatura here is something to look out for and the Chinese delights such as chow mien is good but oily a though.

Owner is very rude. He dont accept his mistakes. He baked wrong photo cake at the last moment and spoiled bday. He challenged that someone who will bring a better cake then of his shop, then he will name his bakery shop to that person. I will just suggest that dont order anything from that shop.

Really pathetic cake with fungus in bread. Felt like dust particles in my mouth. Stay away don't order in cake from here. Mr. Mukesh the owner deneis it but I am attaching photos which reveals everything.

Third rate place. First they delivered the wrong cake, but I had guests over, so decided to ignore that, but the cake tasted like stale bread with really bad quality icing.Left a bitter aftertaste in my mouth. I wonder what ingredients went into making such a pathetic tasting cake. Stay away.

Thank you so much Dee Cake Shop for perfectly customizing my 6-month Anniversary Cake. The soft and creamy texture of the pineapple cake almost melted in my mouth. I'm certainly gonna place more orders with Dee Cake Shop... üéÇ
Bread was too bad and smelly. And the worst part is blueberry was melting after keeping it in fridge for whole night.
They sent us melted damaged cake

The marble cream cake was all cream.JUST SEE THE CREAM THAT WAS IN THE CAKE... I HAVE SEPARATED IT...  The cake was poorly made.... Spoilt my wife's B-Day..... Poor show... Walnut brownies need lot of improvement......
Quite a refreshing place to bite into a yummy snack. The sweets, the savoury all provide a wide variety of options to choose from. And it does win you some way or the other.
Aggarwal sweets in Munirka is since ages . almost 2 decade old. the best thing you can get Thier is samosa and bread pakora. rest are all okay nothing great.

This one is right opposite to Vasant Vihar Bus Depot (there are 3 Aggarwal Sweets in Munirka). Price is average. Quality is good. Apart from sweets one can find basic food options like samosa, kachori, bread pakora etc and not to forget golgappe and tikki.

Been here on several occasions as it is very close to and en route of JNU. They serve lunch ü•ô in afternoon and snacks in evening. A wide range of sweets are also available to choose from. I like Imarti and Barfi they make. Save puri, Dahi Bhalle and Chaat are also okay. Overall, this is a typical Aggarwal Sweet corner, like many we come across in Delhi. üçΩ
Me and my friends went to Munirka for some workand had some snacks here with friends. The place is higenic and taste was also good at a reasonable price.
Great food, cheerful vibes  and great,cooperating staff. Totally justified cost and tasty food.  Would totally recommend going there. Loved the ambience!
Nice. Though the place is a bit smaller than i expected the food makes up for it. This is a place to go to for the people from mizoram who misses their homefood.
Great food and cute ambience,went here last week and had a great time with friends Really like artuitauh and the non-veg menu Should definitely try it out

I like this place ok. The lestaulant also very small but very smart no, the waiter also very cute and food also very niceee. I want tru kham again if I get the chance. I will surely kham and bring my friend also. Ka duhhh lutukkk!!! üòÇüòÇüòÇ
The place is awesome , you can try their Sanpio its the best thing to eat there, even you can get pickles also. if you want to taste mizo food its the best place in delhi
One of the oldest bakery with finest cakes and other bakery products. Any occasion they have their customised cake . Loved their nutella cake . All the products are reasonably priced .

Well known for cakes and bakery items in munirka, Old and famous and have lots of options for bakery items from cakes to sandwiches...and Cakes are exceptionally good and are reasonably priced. Loved their Nutella cake......

Once i ordered so many items from this outlet and found the great chance I mean found the great taste. Ordered veg momo, Egg fried rice, Chicken fry, Mix soup, Fish rice, Egg spring roll. All were just good in taste... Delivery was just awesome way. Thank you so much...
This restaurant is great good Chinese food and chilly potato chicken fry rice and momo and chicken fry momo  is very nice üëç  üçùi love this restaurant...... üçú

Small outlet with cheap and best Chinese delicacies.                                                                  Chicken fried rice and chicken fried momos is my preference at this restaurant.                             We get it packed and then move onto my friends room so as to gorge on that.                       Ambience:3/5 Service:4/5 Quality:2/5 Quantity:4/5
Veg mein non veg yae Kya majak hai not acceptable please aap veg or non veg mix na karae I am pure vegetarian not happy with this app non veg ki list mein rakhar
I ate their noodles and cheese nuggets... I didn't like that at all... My health got bad after eating their food... The place where they make is too unhygienic....
Sitting is okayish. Benches. Lot of food and beverages variety available. Found it a little bit expensive for the area, service and quality of food it is giving. But taste is good enough.
we ordered spring rolls, chicken rolls, nuggets and grilled chicken sandwich ..........all of them were very good except chicken roll ........it is very pocket frndly .....a must try

This outlet sale old sweets which is spoiled.today I purchased samosa and lassy .but lussy was spoiled it happened many times . They told me this is fresh and sold 250 glass of lassy .and don't have manner to talk with customer.i will never go again in aggarwal sweets.

This sweets and snacks corner is right on the main road of Munirka Market. We have tried both their snacks as well as sweets. In snacks they serve a good variety. We have tried their tikki, gol gappe and samosa. None of the things was disappointing.  In sweets we tried their Gulab jamun and Besan ke Laddo. Sweets are fine but nothing extra ordinary in taste. We recommend that you go for snacks instead of sweets.

I had ordered a chicken liver fry and 2 rice with chicken curry... firstly, they took 1 hr to deliver from munirka to arjun nagar, safdarjang enclave and the food had gone cold by the time it reached. Also, they did not deliver the complete order- 1 rice with chicken curry platter was missing and zomato executives did not even refund the full amount for it when I reported. Liver fry and chicken pieces were chewy. Quantity was less for even 1 person  I had ordered from this restaurant earlier too. Back then, even though they took time to deliver, food atleast was tastier and the quantity was sufficient.  Utterly disappointed with their current service

Service- Home delivery.  I ordered butter chicken and pork pickle . The worst butter chicken I have ever had ......3 star just for pork pickle which was awesome but the quantity is very less as per the price ......but anyways it was so good I order it again.
Food quality was good also food was warm.
food is nice
It was too watery, no salt at all.

I vegetable noodles, honey chilli potatoes and chicken momos. All three dishes were disappointing. There were barely any vegetables in the noodles, the potatoes were greasy and while the momos had flavor they lacked taste. The prices are nice and low and suit the student community, but will not satisfy a more discriminating audience

Best place for ordering a Chinese combo Thali. Very cost effective and quite tasty as well. Hard to find such good Momos in such a less price. noodles are also good. Spring Rolls were average. The only thing that disappointed me was the Veg Manchow Soup whose taste and packing both were not impressive.

First of all I‚Äôm sorry for not adding pics.. I was really hungry and just dig into the food So I ordered chilli gobhi, chicken steamed momos, chicken fried rice and chicken schezwan So the quantities were good.. so was the quality of the food. One could tell that love was put into making the food.  They even courteously provided a good amount of tissues and some cutlery which I‚Äôve seldom seen unless you specifically ask for it. If you‚Äôre hungry and nearby Munirka go ahead and order from this place without giving a second thought. The most bang for your buck (food wise)

I order almost every 3 or 4th day from this place but some times they make very good, sometime very oily, some time wrong so i have mix review for this place but i like the taste. Honey chilli potato should more crispy.

It's a very worst experience to order from the pure kitchen, we ordered Chinese combo but they provide us wrong product and whatever they provide all the stuff is stale, very disgusting and very disappointing.... Plzz don't order from this kitchen...
Nice rolls in affordable price. Taste is average not that great. So if you are hungry do give visit this place. I think this place won't disappoint you.
I am visiting this shop from last 3 years and I always love the roll of this place. In taste and pocket friendly. Though the downside is home delivery being not available and its deep inside munirka.

we were just passing by after knowing that we r going to miss the biryani in the mess..and guess what..we decided to try this place out and were amazed to find that such authentic south indian food is being served in our neighbourhood.we were 2 and ordered a special combo which had so mich to offer to our tastebuds.Not only the quantity was good enough,surprisingly every single dish in the combo tasted simply awesome.the utappam is a dish i never liked but when i tasted their utappam..it is now in my favourite list..i was so happy that i could find a place in munirka where u can eat sumptuous south indian delicacies under 200.The south indian owners were very polite and happy to serve.the dining area looked clean.L ooking forward to go again and explore some more dishes
One of the reasons I like staying at the Eros hotel is for the breakfast spread at Blooms You have abundant choices and it is delicious as well.!
Thanks to chef sohan for serving us most delicious mutton and chicken dishes  in town .. ultimate food .. nice and hygience place to visit ..
The best breakfast in town above that serviceis superb the guy name ATUL attended us nicely best place to visit
Thanks Reet and deepanshi

I visited this outlet recently and I had Mcaloo tikki, Pizza mcpuff and mcswirl chocolate. The combination is my all time favourite and I love it. They never compromise with quality. Although the outlet is quite crowdy but their service is quick
Super in taste #hygeineatitsbest #their peri peri fries #new combo deals are amazing #coffee #super n best and offcourse affordable to have something.

Mcdonalds is the ultimate burger place... Anywhere in the world ... Any outlet in the world .... It will taste the same and it will make you feel the same .... 100% the place which serves the best french fries in the world ... The Mcafe is also awesome .....

Have been tried this place many time since I love the French Fries, Strawberry Sundee, Veggie Wrap of McDonal's.   Cleanliness: Please can be more cleaner.  Food Quality: Food quality is good but can be better.  Beverage & Dessert: In love with Strawberry Sundee and Ice Tea
One of the oldest and authentic Chinese restraunt in Delhi. Had the veg clear soup, the seven treasure vegetables with the clay pot vegetables. The meal was great and ended it with some Chinese tea.

Excellent eating experience.. from walking in the door and being greeted by employee, seated and drink order taken, was maybe 5 minutes. Meal was served hot and excellent taste. Server was very friendly and helpful.... Will definitely visit again soon...
Amazing Food, Sunil is a great server love the atmosphere

Amazing food and service! Empress of china is our go to chinese restaurant. We love the food and impeccable service as usual. Special thanks to Mr Aman for servicing us so well and taking care of our dietery restrictions.
Small place tucked in the Epicuria food mall- with quick service. Food quality decent. A little overpriced. Staff is very efficient and helpful.

Delicious! Service with a smile. Malaysian laksa vegetarian soup had more than a healthy portion of vegetables, which is a rare sight. The prawn tempura sushi roll was a treat. The rice was sticky and sweet. An additional garlic based sauce packed a punch. Sauteed sole was huge portion and cooked to perfection. Value for money.

Amazing food and really good service. If one loves Asian and Thai cuisines, this is the place !! And one can enjoy food with friends at their rooftop seating area.  Food : 4/5 Location : 3/5 Service : 4/5 Ambience : 3.5/5

Best Asian food I have ever tried!! Brilliant food, lovely ambiance and great service. I went with my 3 friends, we have ordered 6 items which includes Khao suey noodles soup, prawn dumpling, chilli chicken as starters, and for main course black bean chicken, chicken khung pao, Hakka noodles and chili garlic fried rice. I tell you guys each dish tastes so good that you cannot compare each other. Also ordered 2 Coke. Good quantity food, only thing dumpling should be increased in quantity from 4 pieces to at least 6. Total amount around 4000 approx.  Average price for two : 2000 without alcohol. Recommended dish Khao suey noodles Soup in coconut milk (Thai cuisine). Next time I will visit and try some prawn dish for sure.

The dimsums are over priced..300 plus taxes for 4 dimsums is quite high...should have atleast 6 dimsums in a basket. Also, they have discontinued with the combo dimsum baskets. Green thai curry was bland and just about average. Prawn penang dimsums were excellent..a must have.
Amazing place to hangout with your friends. It's great for all the lovers of drunk DJ Night. It is also one of the most expensive in New Delhi.
The best place to hang around and have some booze .lovely ambience and the dj will never disappoint you with his music . SPL thanks to the manager who's always there for the assistance .
Great place for people like me who called themselves party lovers. Budweiser was the only beer available that day so it was a drawback..so ultimately its a nice place
Ambiance was good ! Dj was also good ! They don't upload all the pictures !  sometimes you will feel you are at the right place but suddenly you will change your mind ! But the staff was amazing üòÅ

Went there on Delta heavy night and it was super amazing ... Duo has been my all-time favorite as I'm listening them from past 10 years.. it's good place with good vibe all around... you should must try their cocktails ,fish and chilli chicken coming to sitting they got wide areas behind for sitting and sound is amazing however I found light bit tacky.... So there were 2 DJ's before Deltaheavy....The 2nd DJ was good and had good sense of music but the very first DJ was totally an ARSE..impatient and stupid .. he played bangers in his opening set what a stupid .. Thank god Delta Heavy didn't sue or screw him..though they must have thought what an A hole

Nice and famous outlet, it is always buzzing with people. I often order lunch from the place. Chola Bhatura and Veg Biryani are very good (Biryani comes in a big earthen pot even on delivery 10/10 for presentation) Delux Thaali is also one of my most ordered item from the place
Previous amritsari thali was the better one.this time amritsari thali spoil our mood ,worst experience ever with sona .
Thali is amazing . Good material . Nice place
The thali is amazing. A great place for family dinner and also a good place for #vegan people.
A bit crowded but nice place to visit and the paneer platter is amazing
in last 3-4 years there have been flooding of chai cafes who offers english teas but noone can beat thadi wali cutting chai, eagerly waiting for thadis to open.
The prices have gone up and the food taste and chai has gone for a toss. Not Happy with chaayos experience anymore.

Chayyos epicuria is a small place with good ambience. The service is good and the chai amazing. I usually go for meri wali chai and always find it made the way I want to be, with nothing more and nothing less.
Suresh

Superb dinein experience at Pind Balluchi Nehru Place. Happy hours discount is awesome here. We were looking for some good restaurants cum bar and one of my friend suggested this. We ordered some drinks a d got 1+1 happy hour offer on this, other dishes are chicken tikka, chicken rara butter roties, biryani and we alls loved the taste. I specially love to mention service which is top class. Staff is very polite and cooperative. will love to visit again soon
Good food and good service.Loved the ambience ,very courteous staff and very friendly.food was awesome. Would love to visit again .. specially Soya Chap

Karim's is one of the best mughal restaurants serving mouth watering Mutton Rohan Josh. Had gone to Karim's for dinner. Ordered Mutton Rogan Josh, mutton was good and properly cooked. The service was good. Staff is polite and courteous.
Mutton korma was mouth watering and filling, authentic taste of mutton. Must go.

Karim's is a well known name from Delhi 6 which has got many outlets across Delhi. I visited the outlet located in Epicuria mall, Nehru Place. Their menu is filled with chicken and mutton delicacies.  I ordered a mutton Korma and naan. The order was served in 15 minutes. The food tasted amazing.  Korma was perfectly spiced and  the mutton pieces were well cooked. Naan looked more like khameeri roti but was toothsome.  Karim's never fails to amaze me.  Recommended!!

This is best place to have Biryanis, Kebabs, Tikkas and rolls. I was longing to have mutton seekh for a very long time . Ordered Karim's Roll which is basically mutton seekh roll. It was lip smacking...the flavors were on point. This place never disappoints me.
I ordered a sub with sprite the've sent me mirinda and also they sent me lays instead of cheese cornitos never gonna order from them .
If you are going for healthy food. Must go there
This is my go to place for healthy and delicious subs and sandwiches. Love their chicken tikka sub, must try

I had ordered for my beverages along with my food Only food came and no beverage. When i called them, they said write a complaint. You‚Äôd get a refund and then order again. No empathy towards the customers.

Every now and then we crave for Chinese food, so we had double paneer and manchurian combo. But unfortunately we were disappointed with the food. We have been to Yo china! located in faridabad as well which never disappointed us.

It is the best place for all the Chinese lovers. Veg manchurian sizzler is a must try.  Honey chilli potatoes and veg Hakka noodles are taste bud satisfying.   Yo China is a budget friendly restaurant.  So you could go as many times with your friends. Service and staff are good  Food-4.5/5 Service 4.5/5
Very good food, tried their sizzlers and chilli dry fish and prawns with some rice..it was a very good experience, they just need to lower their prices a bit on some dishes!
I ordered Chilli Paneer Sizzler which was served hot and tasted really good. Noodles were perfect in taste with hot garlic sauce. One should must try it.

Worst food of the century at Yo China epicuria Mall can't be consumed by the human beings unlimited Chilly in the food, worst food worst restaurant Yo China epicuria Mall, wastage of money and so expensive useless food

A lovely cheeze burst Paneer pizza with a lovely crust and amazing toppings it's a bit over priced when compared to other pizza chains but trust me when I say this the taste is worth every penny spent I am in love with the pizzas at pizza hut I would really recommend you try and compare for yourself and find out how right I was hehe But I will definately recommend pizza hut over any other pizza chain. Period
Pizzzzzzzzzaaaaaaaaaa Hut Very gooooood tandorri smokey taste üòçüî•  Their tandoori paneer pizza is litüî•
Not good
White sauce was something at last thing qtgat would I would like to eat

This shop is located in the Satyam complex on the side from where you enter the main walking area of Nehru place Market. It's a small outlet with no seating. A few people can stand and eat, though. The cleanliness levels are not bad, but not super clean. The value for money they offer is great.  I got a Malabar Parantha and veg korma packed from here yesterday. The Malabar Parantha is excellent, but the veg korma given with it was mainly soyabean based, and a little bland to my liking. Since it's a chain, it appeared to me that the Parantha was prepared there itself, whereas the korma was prepacked.

May not meet the exact taste-bud you may be having on mind and tongue.. but worth the prices.. ordered rava-dosa and sambhar few days back.. sambhar was good but rava-dosa didn't match the class and taste of other south-indian outlets. Nevermind. Good to go.
Southy is good option if you are looking for south indian food. Visited this outlet first time.¬† Had butter masala dosa which was good in taste, ambience was average, service can also be better .

Had the one of the better snacks thali for 215. It had food for 2 small stomach people. The place does not have ac but but if they weather is good then you can enjoy out in the market. Try the snacks thali you will not regret it

Great South Indian food. They have many outlets in delhi NCR.¬†The¬†food is tasty, authentic and very economic. The packaging of the food was well.  Ordered the following:¬†  Lemon Rice: Was very tasty and very light on pocket. The quantity¬†was also good. ¬†  Paneer dosa: Tasted good. The paneer stuffing was cooked very nicely¬†and was served with Samber, coconut chetney and tomato Chetney. Samber was good in taste.  Additionally they had included a plain papad in the order which was very fresh and crispy.  *** Follow me Instagram/FB - fithungrytraveller and on Snapchat - snap_fht ***

Ordered for famous Paneer Rice and shahi kofta but was Utterly SHOCKED AT WHAT I got as the RICE ITSELF WAS PLAIN BOILED RICE AND NOT THE USUAL PULAV THAT U GET TO BEGIN WITH. NEXT, THE PANEER AND KOFTA GRAVY WERE THE SAME WITH A LITTLE PIECE OF PANEER AND A TINY BALL OF KOFTA SWIMMING IN ORANGE GRAVY, TASTING AS TOMATO SAUCE......WHATEVER HAPPENED TO THE TASTE AND QUALITY, FEEL DISSAPOINTED AND CHEATED.
Pathetic place. Pathetic review about this place.  Pathetic condition. Pathetic feedback pathetic review pathetic performance pathetic pay pathetic pathetic

Tried this place out with a group of friends but the overall experience wasnt too good.  The food quality was ok but the portions were too less for the price. 3/5  Service was simply pathetic.People there had no idea on what drinks to serve under discount or package and their behavior also wasn't too appreciable. 1/5  The ambiance was overall decent as there was not much of a crowd. 3/5  Because of the bad experience,would never go to this place

The three-course meal was a good buy! The salad in the starters though can be altered as it was just lots of cabbages with mayo which wasn't so something I relished. Quiet place! Good music and ambience!
There was a huge rodent in the restaurant. If this is the state of affairs where customers sit, I can only imagine what the kitchen is like. That's not the kind of food anyone would want to eat.

The 2.5 rating is only because the drinks were good. This place used to be actually good. However lately the food quality has gone down. The nachos we ordered were burnt n flavourless. Main course also was not up to the mark. It'll take a lot of improvement before I visit again.
Whenever you want to have indian , you can get the food delivered from moti mahal... good taste and lovely to relish dal makhni with naan.
Aweful... ordered deluxe thali. Food appearance and taste old unfresh .,.. aweful taste...white dal makhni...mix veg frozen...was it really moti

Its the best place to have Desi Indian food. The weather was so good that day that I decided to have Indian cuisine. Spicy food was the perfect company for a rainy weather.   Must try-  Kadhai Chicken  Chicken Lababdaar  Garlic Naan  Meal Combos/ Thalis  Tandoori platters are way too good!!

Went to this place with lot of expectations. We order a Non veg Thali. Though the butter chicken was very good but the taste of dal was not satisfying. Also the quantity of dal is very less. Otherwise other things were fine. I hope to have a better experience next time
Food and portions not at all at par with the quantity you guys serve. Really need to work on this to improve. Sad quantity levels!
The four cheese pizza I ordered had nothing put cheese spread, the charged me for trash food.
Atrocious is the only word for them. Order at ypur own risk.
Amazing dosas and south Indian fare. The rawa masala Dosa is perfectly well prepared and the accompaniments are traditional too! The service is smooth and hassle free.

This place is a paradise for veggie lovers  Great south india food They also have a big range of North Indian food  All the food tastes good  My order in detail  1. Paper plain Dosa- served with Sambher and 3 chutney, the paper plain Dosa is very crisp and yum , I prefer plain one , if you like masala to go for then my advice will be to take it separately as the crisp of the Dosa last till your last bite 3. Butter masala Dosa : very tasty again served with sambher and chutney the butter masala Dosa is good in taste but I feel it to be bit oily this can be personal too but the person who accompanied me cherished it thoroughly  Overall the place is very good a must try

Shree Rathnam is quite an old name in this industry, famous for it's delicious South Indian variety. Being a vegetarian, I prefer those restaurants which are purely vegetarian. Voila, Shree Rathnam is pure vegetarian !! üòç  Though Shree Rathnam is famous for delicious South Indian cuisine but recently tried hands on their Chinese variety of dishes. Tried Chilly paneer dry, hakka noodles & veg Hot n Sour soup. All of them were pretty good. Chilly paneer dry was the best.   Overall a good restaurant for small gatherings & maybe family outings. Dillikepakwan recommends this.

Yay or Nay - Yay  Pocket-Friendly - Yes  After roaming around in the nehru place market.. We got hungry and so decided to munch on something. This is a good place to try out South Indian food but we decided to have pani puri and some chaat. The chat was good but pani puri wasn't that good. It's difficult to find the best pani puri in Delhi I guess.

It, is a place where you can get the wide range of food,from the north Indian to South Indian and the,Chinese as well !!! This place is perfect for the family,although, I feel that they are loosing their authentication when It comes to the South Indian food.  Overall the food is OK  Service Is OK
Best and cheesy pizza

Always a pleasure to have my favourite pizza from this place and they totally deserve applause. Ordered my favourite pizza, i.e. onion, corn flavours and they delivered it on time. Though the oder is big as per quantity but still it's on time and totally fresh. Really love the service and ofcourse pizza. Recommendations - 8/10
As always value for money and the best

This outlet of subway is located in the epicuria mall food court in the basement of the mall. The staff here is friendly and courteous. They do not fuss about putting extra sauces as some of the other subway outlets do. Every time I have had a sub here the veggies and the bread are super fresh. I don't prefer the processed meats from subway so mostly order the veggie delight sub or salad with loads of sauces. Also, one can never resist the double chocolate chip cookies which are a must have.  ¬†(hint: ask them to give the cookie warm and thank me later)
I had ordered Chicken Biryani last week and it was delicious. Quality of food is amazing at the best price offered by this outlet. Must try..
Ambience is great..!!! And food too is good.. Would suggest people to visit here.. Whole menu is superb.. Very convenient to travel and its just reasonable at cost..
Nice and delicious food and price are budget friendly want to recommend others , quantity is also good with very hygiene quality of food !!!!
Amazing interior, the service is really good. A good place for dinner. The taste of food is amazing. Variety of delicacies. Staff service is also nice
Great ambience! Lovely food!  Highly recommended!  Chicken tikka roll was quite subtle in taste. Bhuna degi gosht is the go to dish.  Right opposite metro station.
Food and services were very good , Nonveg plater are very delacious, Restaurant is also very neat and clean it's best place for family in Abul Fazal.

Not a very nice experience. I had ordered a chicken sandwich and tea.The staff was busy on their mobile phones. While the sandwich was ready and getting cold, there was noone available to make the tea and serve the order. When I questioned the delay is when they started to work on the order. There should be some sort of quality control in place.

The worst place I have ever been to! I am a coffee fan!! You guys simply ruined my coffee today. I guess the worst CCD I hv ever been to would be this. Staff doesn't know anything. Doesn't convey the right message. Coffee tasted pathetic, don't know whether their machine was not running properly or the beans used were not of good quality. And yes we ordered a paneer sandwich with cheese ( which the lady on counter upselled saying- aapka sandwich nahi toh bahut Sukha Sukha hoga) and when the order came , there was no cheese in it! Exploring munchy treatment from ccd with their new cold combo of mighty muncher which has an option of cold cafe frappe and a classic sandwich in which i opt for corn n cheese sandwich. Ambience of the place is nice and you have an comfort level while sitting there.Food is quite fresh and they have well mannered staff. Fruitylicious fiesta is the new addition to their menu which includes drinks with fruit of the season so go out n try that too.
Sweet tooth person will go there.

This is the only pure vegetarian outlet located in community centre of NFC. The paneer dishes here are very good especially the paneer pasanda. Thalis are better option if looking for a complete lunch. Overall the prices are reasonable and a good option for students.
I had one of the worst experience of my life dining in this restaurant. The food quality is pathetic and the staff isn‚Äôt polite as well#aggrawalbhenkalola

Have tried a few veg meals and old delhi style faluda kulfi  Meals were average one ; so does the faluda kulfi.   You normally gets better kulfi in delhi; here it was too sweet; faludas were not the refreshing and kulfi was a bit hard

Tried Papdi Chat and Aloo tikki, both were good. It is located next to Al Bake and hence you can locate it easily. If you are looking for proper dining then it is not a place, more of a street food and quick eat. Chat is a must try.
Best dish is chaska roll and tandoori momos. Delivery option is not good. Overall fantastic one of the best halal restaurant in Delhi in Okhla area

worst restaurant ever. I have ordered 2 times from here. first time they sent wrong order and second time i have ordered 2 chow mein and we received only one. we didn't ordered from zomato for this but i am using this platform to aware you all of you please dont order anything from here.
Food taste good ambience is not too well got for takeaway or delivery at reasonable price with good quantity space is less cam go there if group is small
One of my favorite places in new friends colony... Seriously, I highly recommend this place..They Served best mutton masala, chicken dahiya and butter chicken.. Highly recommended!!!
City‚Äôs amazing freshly baked breads at an amazing discounted prices.. great quality and a must try thing..

Belongs to a five star hotel, hence has the benefit of serving quality food. Food is good, ambience is good, staff is good, however there is only one at a time. So I had ordered a cake and he had gone to pick it up from the kitchen, during that time there were 2 guests waiting and none to attend. This entire activity took some 20 mins to pick up a pre ordered üç∞.

According to me French Crust is among top 3 bakery's in Delhi. I am eating their cakes since my Childhood. ¬†But at the same time i want to share my bitter experience also with French Crust. I ordered a fancy cake 10 days in advance obviously for a very very important occasion. When i ordered the cake the person took the order didn't say that it would come out to be different and when i got the cake it was nowhere close to what i had asked for. So i canceled my order of which i had paid in advance 100 percent, i was promised that i would get voucher of similar amount to use in future in Suryaa Hotel's eaterys' but i haven't got anything yet. Check out the photographs which would explain what i wanted and what i got. But still i would say as long it is the matter of taste then according to me French Crust is among few best in Delhi NCR, believe me i have already tried most of 5 star hotel's bakery's the only message is that don't go for cosmetic cakes. I had ordered another normal cake which Chef recommended me and that was Brownie cake and i must say that the Chef recommended me the right cake and everyone enjoyed that in my family.

Baskin and Robbins have a small and compact outlet at the NFC market. There is not much things to say about ice creams when it comes to Baskin and Robbins, they craft really delicious and very yummy ice creams. Went for trying a unique flavor of ice cream which is Mint white chocolate chip & to my surprise it was so yummy. It has adequate place for sitting , but you can find a lot of benches outside the outlet. Overall a good experience.  Taste: 5/5  Service: 4/5  VFM: 4/5

This is my favorite flavor of all time. I love brownies but usually prefer vanilla over chocolate ice cream because I do not like things that are too sweet. But this flavor is just amazing. Love the brownie.
I love to visit this place! It's been a while i visited here... But i remember the blueberry cheesecake ice cream! Its was just mouth watering with. Really a very nice taste!
Best place for ice cream lovers to visit give it a try on virgin chocolate and dark chocolate and ret of all ice creams are highly creamy. And chocoblock was also amazing.
A great place for tasty food . I ordered Butter chicken from them on numerous occasions and have loved it . Chicken tikka,Malai tikka and other Mughlai items have been awesome.

Being tired and very lazy, ordered tandoori chicken, butter chicken, roomali roti and dal makhani from this place. But i was left totally dissapointed by what was delivered.  The tandoori chicken was half cooked and chewy. The dal tasted stale and old, nothing sort of what you would expect from such a big brand. The butter chicken had a funny taste and the chicken was again chewy and dry. The only saving grace was the roomali roti, which i know for the fact are not made in house.  This franchise business have done nothing but bring down the name of such big legends.
Best butter chicken in New Friends Colony to order home. Must try it once, the butter chicken is extremely fresh and the gravy makes one binge.
Amazing place for home delivery. Love their butter chicken & chicken tikka masala with romaali roti. Definitely for a quick bite‚ù§Ô∏è. A place I'll have from again!

I completely love food. Especially their dum aloo, Virgin Mojito. Service was good. Friendly staff. Quite expensive but according food its worth it. But do check the bill, and request Them to remove service charge.
This is one of the best place to enjoy food. Extremely delicious and hygienic food.  Staff is well behaved and courteous...
Awesome veg food, loved karai paneer. Quality of roti is awesome, very soft roti and paranthas ... will order again soon

This old fashioned restaurant was visited by me in the hope that it‚Äôs food would be great. However, when I ordered mutton curry and butter chicken, I wasn‚Äôt happy with cooking. The gravy in both were too thick and hardly tasty. To top it, the plain rotis were slightly burnt in the tandoor and gave a bitter after taste because of the carbon.  Om hotel is no more what it used to be earlier.

Left out 1 star just because of the prices. They're a bit high. But, the quality, the taste, the ambience... it's spot on! Really enjoy going here on a Saturday night. One must try their Dal Khatir, Mutton Kakori, Gravy, Veg Galouti and Phirni

Delivery from Chawlas never disappoints. My all time favourite is Butter Chicken in mains and chicken chops in appetizers. Quick service with amazing taste.
You must try afghani chicken from this outlet.  Balanced creamy and nicely grilled. Good quantity of food in full plate...staff behaviour is good..nice and clean place..

Today i ordered paneer tikka; rumali roti, and chicken....its too yummy and spicy...delivery was to fast...packing was neat and clean...i like all the food iteams

The healthy pizzas by Instapizza are scrumptious. The crust is thin and the pizza is loaded with toppings. I have tried the Classic American Pepperoni pizza, BURRAAH chicken makhani, mac and cheese poppers and peri peri potato wedges. The wedges were crispy and the poppers had a lot of cheese

Insta pizza has some wonderful and tasty pizzas. The order delivers as soon as possible. The cooking time is quiet less, the food has an amazing fragrance and it delivered hot. This is my place for my fast food cravings. All the trendy dishes are available in this place and every Dish and every cuisine is delicious in taste astonishing. Perfect and delivered on time. Also, their customer support team contacted us for resolving issues faced during last order. Thumbs up to companies that do this.
they have great variety of sandvich and if you are found of sandvich then you should must visit place.. order tandoori chicken sandwich and it was great taste..

My go to place for fancy cakes. They did my parents 25th anniversary cake. It was one of the best cakes I've tasted my entire life. I hate fondant but the fondant they used was thin and didn't taste fake. It was a chocolate mud cake flavored cake. Amazing flavors! The fondant work on TOP! Everyone loved it. There wasn't enough cake for the people as we ordered keeping in mind that there will be other desserts too but the other desserts were left untouched until the cake got over. Only if I had ordered a bigger size.  Have also tried her pies and other cakes. Superb in all ways!

I am ice cream lover many times I ordered ice cream from them due to lover prices ice cream are tasty but they add coconut etc with some flavour which not goes well with flavour such as vanilla but Some flavors are really good like chocolate, strewberry etc. Must try their tubs

I have heard lot about this restaurant. But when i took a first sip, the milk was expired and the owner was not willing to accept the same. Despite his servant admitted the same .  Thereafter, people gathered and i learnt that this restaurant has depleted its quality and thats why not able to fetch customers now. Poor quality.

Pal refreshment corner is well placed in Jangpura near to Barbeque nation area..  We visited jangpura with some work and missed our lunch and by the time we were free we checked quick food.. So we landed to Pal refreshment corner..  We had ordered below items, do not kbiw what went wrong we entered after reading all the reviews and experience was not satisfactory..  Veg Spring roll-it was too oily and when we complained they changed and next time served ok  Veg fried rice-Although we were full hungroo still we could not had veg fried rice and chilli paneer and left the food as there is no taste in it..  Chilly paneer--Not sure chilli paneer had no taste and we co plaint for this as well but chef cameand told i use to cook the same way.. But later, we agreed leave as it is and we had left the plate..  Chicken fried rice-Tgis was good in proportion and taste and we had this and finished the bowl.  Later, we told all this incident to the owner and initially he assured us that same chef is preparing for everyone no complaint whatso ever, but when we told sir we were full hungry and still could not able to finish so you just think.. so atlast he charged few rupees less in the bill..  Thank you!! Sir..  Not sure that was just a bad day or so.. But had ok ok experience..  All the best Team!!  Regards, CSD

Good place for takeaways. It also has a sitting arrangement for about 12-15 people. Quality of food is good and its hygienic too.CCTV cameras in kitchen also which even customers can view.. try their faluda kulfi

This is a really good bakery, serving amazing cookies, cakes & much more. The cakes & other bakery stuff is always fresh, this bakery maintains a really good quality with their products. This is a very old & renowned bakery & can be trusted for cakes & cookies & other snacks‚ù§Ô∏è

I love Janta bakery's Red Velvet cake. This is so delicious that melts in my mouth so quickly. Pineapple pastry was also good. But nothing can't beat the taste and smoothness of Red Velvet cake.  Next time will try their choco chips cake as well. Love you Janta Bakery :)

Thus is one of old bakery shop.Ordered cake,stifed kulcha,grilled sandwich for my brother on hid birthday,he was very happy with this order.thanks zomato and janta bakers for making his birthday amazing
Worst exp ever ,orders daal makhni with butter roti and malai chaap , after having this meal ,I was feeling like vomit and after this suffering from stomach infection ü§Æ
Totally waste of money.They provide me food with bad packaging, and entirely spilled into polybag. I don't want to take any food from Zomato or this restaurant in future.

Always on a lookout for healthy reasonable food delivery options and tonight I stumbled upon Transform Nutrition. The menu reads decently and I ordered myself a Rose Caribbean chicken meal with brown rice. I was expecting it to be good cuz the description was so. Coming down to the taste test, I was disappointed very much. The quantity is super poor. For a 265 bucks, I recieved barely any food, legit half of what it should be and the flavors were just not right. There was nothing Carribean about the chicken, the tomato gravy was well cooked but seasoned with oregano??!! Adding to that was the level of spice there, not good either.  Overall I was disappointed. Expected better.

Ref to the description provided on swiggy. The wheat pasta contained only capsicum as against the broccoli, beans, mushrooms, olives, basil mentioned in the online ordering menu. Very disappointed with the taste and experience. Never ordering again. ü§Æ

The menu the food is good but I think this restaurant they don't give a damn about the customers I ordered twice by Zomato and I called up the valet after 40 mins to get the update as it said delivery time 37 mins he said sir they have gone to take the item it was out of stock they shouldn't have taken the order in the first place if they don't have and this same situyhas happened before also when I get a call from Zomato with this same place.
Tried this place after a friends recommendation and had their chicken breast. It was moraccan chicken breast. Served hot and filling for one person. The taste was good and it had good flavors.
I went yesterday so I ordered them, their food is very good but there are noisy crowds here i prefer you to take away from this restaurant thank you

i was ordering the chicken tandoori momos last night. the taste of momos is very good. the price is also very economical everyone should be try this but the crowd is not good at the restaurant you will must prefer take away from this restaurant. thank you
Amazing food
Obviously tasty and cost is much affordable as compared to many other restaurants
Best food ‚ù§Ô∏è thank you mr.rahul kumar for serving us‚ù§Ô∏èit was the best bday thank u for making it special my friends enjoyed alot and thank u for making us comfortable

They didn't have anything apart from shawarma when I went there during my lunch hour. N the god awful smell, by the time my food came and I took I bite. I'm sure, I must have puked a 100 times inside . I paid my bill n then serched a dustbin to throw the food n throw up.

Visited this place and ordered food ( kabuli pulao,  kofta and chicken pulao). First packaging was very poor,  by the time it reached home food came out of boxes.  Secondly,  food was very bland moreover it had only one small piece of meat and few pieces of clean bones.  I won't recommend this place and not going back there.

UNN DINO JIN DINO MERI JEEB SIRF OR SIRF TIKKE AUR KARAHI KE LIYE MUTARTI THI KISSI EK MANHOOS SHAAM KO KABUL REST PAHUNCHA,SHURU SHURU KE KADAM BHI RAAH NA BAN SAKEY,ISMELL HI AISI WAHIYAT THI LAGALO MARRI HUI NANGI BILLI JAISI JISNE JAATE JAATE EK HI SAANS MAIN TATTI AUR PISHAAB DONO HAGG DIYE HON,ISME 3/4 NANGI MARRI HUI BILLI KI ULTI BHI JOD DI JAYE TO AAP KE LIYA ASAAN HOJAYEGAA ISMELL KO KAREEB SE SOONGNA ALBATA MU PEH RUMAL BANDH KE DAKHIL HUA,HAIRANI MUJHE EK NAYE PAISE KI NAHIN HUI KYUNKI WAITRAAN KI SHAKAL EK SE EK DRAAVNI THI,JO CHICHA APNE HI PASEENAY SE NAHAKE KHAALI GALLE PE BAITHE THA APNE JAISE MARRE HUE PANKHE KE NEECHAY USKI SACH POOCHO TOH ISMELL MARRI HUI BILLI SE BHI ZYAADA VAHIYAAT THI ¬†(MENU MAIN RED BULL 100 RS KA HAI JO CHICHA KO DIN MAIN 3-4 BAAR PEENA CHAHIYE) LEG FRY AAYEE,NAAM JAISI HI THI TAANG KI HADDI PITROL MAIN FRY KARKE DEDI SHAYAD BANANE WAALE NE USKA GOSHT APNE GANDE MU MAIN CHABA LIYA THA,PALAK KO YAHAN KISSI KHAAS WAJAEH SE GREEN PALAK KAHA JAATA HAI ISKA ZAROOR KUCH NA KUCH NAHIN BAHUT KUCH CHICHA KI DAADI SE LENA DENA HAI KYUNKI CHICHA KI DAADI POORI GREEN THI,PALAK SHORBA SE BHI ZYAADA GREEN-PALAK ITNI UBLI HUI THI KI USKE ANDAR SE AJEEB SE JHAAGH NIKAL RAHI THI KUCH AISI JAB MERI BEHANAIN CHAWAL UBALTI HAIN WAISI ,PALAK SAHI MAYNO MAIN MARR CHUKI THI KUCH SAINKDO SAAL PEHLE ¬†AB JO REHGAYA CHICHA NE SAAMNE RAKH DIYA(SALAT) KE NAAM PE BADBOODAAR PYAAZ JO GALLA HUA THA,TIMATAR YA TIMATAR KA ISKELETON THA,EK BHI BEEJ NAHIN.YEH RESTAURANT KUM AUR POSTMORTEM KI DUKAAN ZYAADA DIKHI,HAR JAGAH BADBOO,GANDGEE,GANDI SHAKLAIN,DARRE HUE CHEHRE KHAANE WALON KE AUR SAAMNE EK ISKELETON JISKI DAADI GREEN HOGAYE HO FUNGUS SE-JIN HAZRAT KA BAHUT DINO SE KUCH GALLE MAIN ATKA HAI YA JIN HAZRAAT KO LATRINE NAHIN AARAHI WOH YAHAN AAYEIN AUR KUCH SECONDS MAIN HI UNKA PAET EK AISI UCHAAL MAREGAA SAB KUCH MU KE ZARYE BAHAR AAJYEGAA! AAP KI ULTI AAP HI KO MUBARAK!

Though I am a fan of mughlai, every once in a while I appreciate the subtle taste of spices from Afghanistan. I visited this place once. We had ordered their korma which was more soupy than the Indian version. It was light on the spices unlike what we usually eat. We had ordered mantu, the Afghani momos.. Served with dahi and chana dal soup on top. Though I wasn't very happy about the chana dal.. The sheer size of the mantu was very overwhelming.... Oh!! That was one huge mutton dumpling. And it was tasty! Their bread was very thick and chewy but went well with the korma. We also tried the biryani which was very mildly spiced with carrots and raisins. It was unusual and yummy.  The best was the kahwa which they served us.  Overall its a decent place to visit.

Not a great experience.Visited Kabul, today the way was torturous. The food Kabuli Pulao, Kofta and Chicken Pulao, i found to be too bland for my palate, though was aromatic. The curry of kofta was runny, and needs to be worked upon. I got the food packed, the packaging was not reliable, it is something which needs attention. Not sure whether, would visit again ....
Food is good but the staff is shit.patties are recommended,stuffed bread dont really have any stuffing here.The staff talks rudly with customers.
I tried this outlet once as I ordered some cakes for my friends birthday recently and they serve good eggless cakes . There cake was soft and delicious too
A small bakery opened a few years back has a decent variety of items on the menu . I specifically like their multi grain bread , assorted breads, rusk , patties and brownies.
This is a small brakery in the market of jankpura and we ordered our one of the cake of new year from here. Cake was ok. Will recommend to people who are exploring this market
This is a bakery which basically sells wide range of biscuits, cakes, breads, pastries etc.  they even have sandwiches and patties which are not bad not very amazing.

i was ordering the mutton curry and jeera rice from this restaurant and its quite awesome the combination is very good mutton curry and jeera rice you should try this combination from this restaurant the one thing is not good in this restaurant is the early closing time. otherwise everything is good. thankyou

Nice place situated near Eros cinema. They don't have proper seating inside however they have put a few chairs and table outside where you can sit and eat. Their non veg dishes are good, try their butter chicken, ladai chicken and also their chicken tikka. The prices are also economical and service is Good.
Must try steamed momos, kadi pakoda and mixed veg. Typical ghar ka khaana. Great joint for take away. It‚Äôs hygienic and clean. The delivery is super fast and the staff is very friendly. Must order!

ASLAAM ALAIKUM WA REHAMATULAHI WA BARAKATU.  REVIEW SE PEHLE AITRAAZ. PEHLA AITRAAZ 1)KABZA PLOT. BHAI KABZA KARKE BAITHO HO YA BAITHKE KABZA KIYA?  DOOSRA AITRAAZ. 2)RESTAURANT KE NAAM SE. SIMPLE TOH BHAI TERA RESTAURANT KISSI KONAY SE NAHIN HAI BHAIYON WALI BAAT KAR RIYA HOON,TU NAAM BADAL KE"MUFLIZ RESTAURANT" RAKHLE ISSE AUR KUCH NAHIN TOH BHAI TERA PERMANENT INCOME KA SOURCE BAN JAYEGA.  REVIEW: KAISE BHAROSA KARTA MAIN "KABZA PLOT"KE MALKAAN PE,PATA NAHIN RAAH CHALTE MURGE YA BAKRE PAR KABZA KARLIYA HO AUR KYUNKI INKE HALAAT KHAREEDNAY WAALEY MUJHE TOH NAA LAGGE. PHIR MAINE SOCHA IBRAHIM SULLULA AB TU AA TOHH GAYA HAI KUCH TRY KAR HI LE TOH MAINE DARTE DARTE CHILLY/HUNNY(SHEHAD)AB YAKEEN HUA CHICCHA KI MUFLIZI AUR JAHALAT KA KHER WOH ALAG BAAT HAI YAHAN CHICHA DOKHA DEGAYE BHAI,AALOO FRESH BHI THAY KARAARE THAY AUR ACCHE SPICY BHI THAY,MAZZA AAGAYA.  DARKHWAAST: 1)CHICHAA JAAN STEEL KI PLATAIN BADLO KABZAA AGAR 1947 KA HAI TOH ISKA YEH MATLAB TOH NAHIN KI MARKET MAIN 1947 KE BAAD STEEL KI PLATON KA NAYA STOCK HI NAA AAYA HO.  2)CHICHA KI MUFLIZI KAHUN YA BHOLAPAN,MUJHE AKELE KHAATE DEKH PHIR BHI CHICHA NE DO CHIMACH AUR DO FORK RAKHE PLATE PAR.  3)CHICHA CHILLY AALOO EK CHOTE AALOO KA NAHIN KAM SE KAM EK BADEY AALOO KA TOH DETE.  AGAR AAP KO SASTA KHAANA,LIGHT KHAANA PASAND SHOR KE BEECH MAIN AUR GAADIYON KE DHUWAIN KE BEECHO BEECH TOH APNE GURDAY KHARAAB KARNE YAHAN ZAROOR AAYEIN AUR APNE KAREEBI LOGON KO BHI ZAROOR LAYEIN MERE KAUNSE ABBA KI DISPENSERY KHULLI HAI..

I just love this restaurant. A number of times, not finding the time to cook, Simple Restaurant has been my Savior. I found it through Zomato and have been hooked ever since. Delectable Food, A huge Menu and quick service are what makes me keep on ordering from them. Compared to other restaurants in my area, they are very cheap, give a huge quantity of the food ordered sufficient for two people and they are quick to deliver. My personal favourites are the Special Thali, the Spring Rolls (Just the right amount of crispy and scrumptious), Paneer Bhurji with Paranthas and Sweet and Sour Vegetable. ¬†Both Non veg and Veg Varieties are good. They have both Indian and Chinese and both are good. I love their range of Paneer, Onion, Aloo Parathas as well which are value for money. Try them once, You will love them! I have been ordering from them since last two years and shall continue to do so in future.
