I really liked their Mango Cake having rich amount of mango fruit in the middle and layers of dry sweet mangoes (aam patti) in between.  The fresh fruit has been my favorite too, the layers of different jellies stacked over each base and fruits on the top. It was amazing to eat.  They also deliver within some 2-3km with nominal delivery charges but for cakes you must give them order in at least 3hr advance so that they may prepare it specially for you or folks can buy form the regular favors too.

This is a very small bakery at Sadulajab. Almost everything what they offer is yummy. Very Very economic.  I personally like their veg/non-veg Sandwichs and a special shotout to chocolate truffle cake.

Owner do not know how to talk to customer. Beware ZOMATO gold customers, they are giving quarter dish if you order half and when you tell them that it‚Äôs quarter they have best answer -‚Äúwe have talked to zomato and if you want half directly order from us‚Äù
My mom ordered 2 of their donuts, they were so bad in taste. They were totally tasteless!! I would never buy from them again, the chocolate one was more worst, the vanilla one was bearable.

Must try KitKat donuts Chocolate gazed  Quality : 4/5 Ambience :3/5 Service:3/5  Best doughnuts in town , tasted rightly sugared & spongy.  The original glazed is a must try and one of my favorites   Looking forward for more  new flavour.  Will visit again

The ambiance was quite nice and was less crowded maybe because of its location. The noodles and chicken were quite authentic Chinese and was tasty. The place gave a sense of real Chinese authenticity. Overall experience was good.

Awesome food and super economical! We ordered sizzler, 1 appetiser and 2 mains and the bill was under 2K. Must try Sizzler during their winter sizzler offer.... I will recommend to my family and friends.
Suraj is a great personality and has great hospitality skills.
Great food.. excellent service by suraj
Suraj has good hospitality skills.

I have been a Starbucks customer for years. The steadfastness of their quality service and coffee is second to none. The proof of their standards is the years and years of proven service and "customer-first" attitude. They get my money because they deserve it. Period.
Love the variety in cakes. I love how delicate and delicious the cakes are. Enjoyed the experience.

This is one of the best ice cream outlet in delhi,  situated in select city walk mall, saket.  The outlet is quite overpriced but I found it worth,  I ordered classic fondue it's full of multi flavored ice creams and fresh fruits with hot chocolate and caramel.  I love to visit again....

The ice cream tasted good But the prices are sky touching high It isn‚Äôt worth it There are better options available out there So instead of spending a thousand bucks here You can save and go to other ice cream parlours !

I'm a big fan of H√§agen-Dazs, and have tried a lot on their menu. But, the Select Citywalk outlet has a simply terrible service. I had very poor experiences last two times I visited. Last time, I ordered a Classic Fondue. We were the only customers inside when we placed the order. The guys took 20 minutes to even start preparing the order - and that too after checking on the status twice. In the end, the icecream balls which are served alongside fondue were almost melting off. Next, today the AC was not working and it was still day time, and hence very hot. When asked, one of the guys said that the AC is working at its best and they know that their is some fault in the AC. The second guy later said that the AC was slightly ineffective because of the power trip few minutes ago (which is a false claim because the AC was not effective at all even when I stepped in, and the power trip happened after I came in).¬† Both the times, I also found the people working at the store very cold and unhelpful.

An evergreen Glacier , their ice cream are rich in taste and in cream too in on word, addictive.  One of the rare Delhi's outlet. I grew up with the vanilla macadamia one but all the flavors are good, Service was nice, they could provide us some glass of water, ( in movenpick we requested them the same service But they wanted to charge for a bottle) H√§agen-Dazs ,ice cream in Esperanto

I came here with high expectations and tried the Eiffel Tower,Belgian Waffle Dream and brownie with ice cream but I was highly disappointed. The quantity is less and taste of the desserts is below average. The place is not all worth the money they charge.

Well Maybe our last visit here.. confused staff, average food ... bad sheesha... inconsistent DJ, and failed to provide chilled beer ... only had premium KF ... very limited (depleted i should say ) bar menu ... we ordered snacks and after 20 min we get to know - not available...   Well  - AVOID

The entrance is simple and vast, not narrow like many lounges. You would lay your eyes on the bar as¬†soon as you enter with seating on the left and the right. The dance floor is also on the left with the DJ at the far end. The place looked better than the last time I went. An intense musk aroma hangs in the air that does a lot to add up to the ambience of the place.

We had done Lenskart party today here & we get to know that lighthouse have worst service in terms of Liquor, in terms of food & even there employees are worst.. if you want my opinion then they can't serve a party seriously.  If you're going to visit lighthouse 13 then think twice. I'll never visit here again in my whole life worst & pathetic service in all terms apart from DJ....
Worst place ever! Don't even go if it is the last option. FYI they served all of us in plastic glasses and the food was also‚Äã pathetic in taste.

So my friend gave his birthday bash here Nd it was memorable bcoz of the music, DJ, interiors and somewhat food. I had chilly panner in snacks which was not so good and kadai paneer was totally onions and lots of it

One of the tastiest galouti and seekh kebabs in the city, the Great kebab factory is bound to leave you with an tendency of having overshot your appetite.the service is on point and the breads are also amazing. Honestly I have never reached the main course level of this place with a lot of appetite because the starters are so amazing.
Great place to visit for buffet limited items but taste was good.  Although service was not upto the mark.  But interior and taste was fine.
Great food and service. !!

This is original khan chacha. Chicken korma was super delicious. Mutton n chicken rolls were ok. Haleem was also good. Its is too crowded and we had to wait for table. Its area is also small. Ambience is average.
this is best delivery outlet and famous in saket.  Ordered their mutton tikka and kakori kebab roll along with mutton biryani. Food is decent and service is quick
This one of the best mocha coffee i have ever had. I just loved this place. Being a coffee lover it's was nice to visit this place and enjoy the cup of coffee over there.

The banana pancakes was very nice. Also the hygiene was up to the mark. I really liked the interior and seating space. Hope to visit again soon..‚ù§Ô∏è #foodie#foodlove#foodporn#foodphotography#foodart#foodforthought
The shop was really eye catching ‚ù§The coffee shop serves best coffee. I ordered coffee and snacks. Food was also delicious üòã

Liked the half n half pizza concept. Picked Provencial (Veg) and Piccante (Non veg; Pepperoni). Really tasty except there should have been flavoured oils or some sauces. Very cute ambiance and great music!

We got a coupon to go to this place from the movie tickets we bought for the Saket Cinema. It turned out to be pretty good! What a surprise and it was quite affordable too!  This is a great place to grab a bite once you're done with the movies.  The decor is classic bar/pub like. The staff is ok--they helped up out with the discounts etc.  The menu is your usual fast food and snacks with some interesting choices thrown in too.  For starters, we ordered stuffed mushrooms which were delicious. The Bombay Cheese Toast was also excellent.  For drinks, we had strawberry peace fizz. A very unusual¬†and tasty drink. Yum!  For the main course, we got flat bread..which was, well, flat. No taste, no oomph-nothing.  We were quite full anyway so it was ok. Maybe try something else on the menu.  This is a pretty great place overall.

Its been close to an year that i have been going to this place and every time i experienced so nice and warm welcome from all the staff member and management. Specially i made a good bound with Subrat Das who help me to choose nice food and drinks all the time. I am looking forward to host some more office gathering to this place and specially in Saket harrys as its close to the place where i work. Thank you so much for all the great evening which i enjoyed the most along with my friends.
Me and my friend had a really good time at this bar yesterday night.The service was very good and the staff were polite to us.I  had memorable night with my friends at this bar.

Weird as hell staffs, didn't know what's on the menu & then huge mismanagement issue happened. They didn't serve us the drink we ordered but charged on bill. We had a huge tussle with the manager as it is not our responsibility to remind them to serve our drink! Please up your game! But your food & drinks were good

Pathetic ! Disgusting! Abysmal!  Mr. Mahesh (who is apparently the manager) needs to learn how to behave with customers if he hopes to stick around in the hospitality industry The waiters there have no clue about the menu items. The manager bills something he hasn't served us - and asks us to forcefully drink it as they've "punched it already in the system" Sangria is decent - don't ever go there - simple enough decision !
unkin Donuts is my favourite place for burgers, donuts and coffee. Spicy grilled chicken burger , potato wedges and a classic dunkaccini is to die for. A wholesome tasty meal you won‚Äôt forget.
I ordered 2 boxes of their 6 set donuts. The only dounut that was not as good as I wanted it to be was the one with sprinkles on it. Maybe because I like chocolate more.
Hey foodies,  Dunkin donut is my favourite place to have a choco Eclairs. Any day and any time.
Best donuts in the world I'm in love with their donuts They offer such a great and wide variety of deserts Food-5/5 Hygiene-5/5 Ambience-5/5 Service -5/5
Restaurant was good however bit overpriced considering food taste
Roof top dining is excellent with good ambience.. Food quality and service is the best thing

Nothing was good expect the ambience. We ordered pizza and chicken tikka which were average, liit which was very bad in taste, both of them, and masala peanut which we couldn‚Äôt even eat. And everything was costly. I thought of having a good experience With the food here but that didn‚Äôt happen.
The worst kind of Caesar salad..no croutons,no cheese and worst of all there was beans and zucchini and carrots in Caesar salad...sauce was very disappointing as well!!

Multiple Billing Issues 1. Person downstairs offered 20% OFF on Total Bill but the waiter only gave discount on Food 2. Service Charge was added on Sub Total instead of amount after Discount 3. The waiter was unprofessional, unhappy and untrained when I mentioned I'll pay via Dineout Pay as if the amount was coming from his own pocket.

An ultimate place for Chinese food lovers. I've been here many times and every time I try out a new dish. So far I've never been let down by any dish that is served in this place. The food is of top-notch quality. Its a heaven for Chinese food lover.

We offered some authentic Chinese food . The items we ordered were very oily but were average to eat. I found nothing special. The place was well maintained. The ambience gave a real sense of China. Overall experience was average.

This restaurant is the most irresponsible unapologetic duffers I have seen to a pure veg family this solved non-veg Jumbo Singapore Wonton noodle soup.  This restaurant has mixed up its vegetarian and nonvegetarian service areas and no one has any idea with the veterans suggesting that the food is vegetarian even when I showed him it's non-vegetarian chicken the manager was unapologetic and said we are sorry.  if you value your relation do not visit this restaurant as chefs and everyone is very unprofessional and insist that they are right

Favourite place to hangout to soothe out that post shopping exhaustion. Perfect place to sit and talk! The coffee and the cinnamon combos are a must try. For all the amazing talks I have had at this place , 5 stars!

Best place to hog onto cinnamon rolls, shakes, bons and they serve everything so fresh that it simply melts in the mouth. We had their classic mini bons and cinnamon iced coffee and both were super good!

I love the ambience, service and the food I mostly love the cheese cake and they served a dish named 3 egg with the slice of bread and salad, and that was damn good. Everything is amazing worth to goüòç
I love the food... Its very delicious... I love the hospitality given to me by Aditya....

Went their for the first time with office team for work outing. The place though have a wide variety of coffees/food available, but it was very compact place. The sandwich could have been better. Double hot chocolate was good. Better to find another coffee palace for a date then this place.
I always have my favorite butter scotch shake and this is shake is amazing

I tried Choco berry blast,exotic mango, chocolate hazaelnut hunger shake and i truly loved it. What a taste,it is so thick in consistency Had tried many shakes but this is marvellous,delicious,that glass bottles is so cute.i love it must try guys.
I really love keventers shake. It‚Äôs my all time favourite.its consistency is so thick taste super delicious. Little price but worth it. Super yummy super tasty. Summers friendüòä

As I wished to try a new Indian flavour, Rose-e-Gulkand seemed to be the right choice. Nice small outlet with a good view and a cap that you can take home as a memento.  I do miss the original price and the authenticity a bit but still a good place to visit without any doubt. Loved the classy milkshake and will surely visit again.
I love the quality of food from this place. Among other places like dominos, tossin, Pizza Hut this one also complies with good food quality practices. I strongly recommend this place.
The red velvet jar which I ordered was very tasty and the pizzas here are crisp and thin. Overall experience was good .
Ordering a 500 bucks Margherita pizza one expects it to be tasty with right quantity of cheese on it . But sorry u disappointed us .
Amazing food and on time delivery
Love the food to the core..

Blue Tokai is an amazing place to have a cup of coffee with your friends . The place has a very calm ambience and the aroma of coffee is all you need to lighten up your day. I loved it‚Äôs croissant ‚ù§Ô∏è
Super kind and accommodating staff even amid tough  times -- delicious and healthy salads I trust and alternative oat/nut milk options for lattes make their options unique and best in town!

This is my go-to place with my husband for a coffee and croissant. They have the best croissants in town. Rasberry cruffin topped with white chocolate is my favourite. We have tried almost every croissant here and each and every croissant is tasty.  The ambience is really cool and pretty, specially the outdoor area.¬†  Must go to this place!!

Been here few times just to ensure I don't write anything wrong. But after experiencing the same thing every time, below are the highlights of this outlet:  *Extremely poor service - Their staff isn't bother whether you are being served water, menu or even food. It's difficult to spot the servers and after continuous reminders, the food gets served.  *Food Quality - The way food is served here is different as compared to the other outlets. Most of the dishes have fried items made in weird smelling/tasting oil or maybe refried which leave a bad taste in mouth.  They really need to work on everything including service and food.  For more updates join me on Instagram @love_yourself_love_life

The best go to place for me considering it serves different varieties of beer and the snacks available alongside and very well prepared..the ambience is nice and has a good seating area for groups.. recommended

I love the koliwadi chicken fry here and ordered that with beer. We ordered the ajwaini fish tikka as well, but we're surprised to find the fish was not fresh. Fortunately, the restaurant replaced the dishwith chicken chili which was better. Earlier, beer cafe used to have a long menu with beers from every country, however the menu is very limited now.

It's always a pleasure to visit this place and treat my taste buds with immense flavors. Started off the meal with Som Tam which was tangy, spicy and very fresh. salmon and khao phad sod where chicken was tender and cooked to perfection and salmon was soft as ever and very well marinated and flavorful. Ended the meal with hot toffee pudding with a perfect balance of sweetness and completely melt in mouth dish with great after taste and works well even if you get a sugar rush. Definitely looking forward to visit again and try on some more delicacies and experience the lavish luxury and treatment. Staff was courteous as always.
Awesome fixed menu at 1800 + taxes. Awesome experience and food. Exceptiinally fine treatment and service provided by Mr. Jugendar of Pan Asian. Full points and must visit.

I loved this place! We had dimsums and prawns for appetisers and they were delicious, as was the lamb in coriander sauce and prawns in xo sauce for main. For dessert, we chose a date pudding which we loved but the fantasy platter could've been better!

#IMPRESSIVE   Yesterday , I visited one of the famous Chinese and Thai Restaurant in Delhi , we were four of us and opted to have the set menu , having a 4 course meal & were served by Mr Jeetendra Singh .   1) We started with appetizers which had :  ‚Ä¢ Vegetable Spring Roll - Amazing , crisp & tasty ‚Ä¢ Chongqing Vegetables - Spicy vegetables  ‚Ä¢ Veg Shanghai Dumpling - Very Ordinary Dumpling ‚Ä¢ Chingqing Tofu - Soft tofu , good taste   2) Sweet Corn Soup : the soup was quite ordinary , served in an ordinary cutlery and had a basic taste.  3) For the main course we had :  ‚Ä¢ Kaeng Phak - Green Thai curry , this was the best in the whole meal . ‚Ä¢ Stir Fried Asian greens : quite basic  ‚Ä¢ Zucchini, shitake Mushroom Tofu - Served in Black bean sauce , it has strong taste .  ‚Ä¢ Asian Mushroom Trio - Assorted mushroom in black bean sauce . Wouldn‚Äôt recommend  ‚Ä¢ Vegetable fried rice : Same as everywhere .  ‚Ä¢ Chilli Garli Noodles :these were tasty, well cooked  4) For The Dessert :  ‚Ä¢ Toffee Pudding with vanilla Ice cream : This was the best party in the whole 4 course meal , the pudding was soft , dressed with caramel , accompanied with vanila ice cream - making it a perfect thing to fill the sugar Binge .  ‚Ä¢ Fresh Fruit Platter - Quite Basic .   Overall the food was good , worth trying & we Went on a Tuesday night , so the ambience was ok-ok , while the service was quite good , Mr J Singh , served us well . A nice experience .  Price of the Set Menu : ‚Çπ 1800++ Taxes / Person

Compliments are most definitely in order for the decor of the place; it bespeaks of thought and effort having gone into it. The staff is polite and courteous, and do their best to make you feel comfortable.  The food, however, was a bit disappointing. I tried the ramen noodle soup with chicken, and prawn tempura. To my great dismay, the soup was underseasoned, and tasted a bit like soy sauce and hot water. The flavours and textures I had expected in this dish were heartbreakingly missing. The prawn tempura was texturally sound. Along with the prawns, however, there was an array of tempura vegetables. The vegetables were perhaps not as dry as they should have been before cooking, and the moisture of the vegetables felt discordant with the crunchiness of the tempura.¬†  I was slightly unhappy with the experience of Japanese food at the restaurant. However, since I have enjoyed many a pleasant meal at other restaurants in the Sheraton, I am inclined to believe that other cuisines served at the Pan Asian would be flavourful.
A nice place to order lunch, the quality and quantity both are a decent.  Simple and tasty food at affordable price In Sarita Vihar. A good aption for desi food lovers
Non hygienic , bad quality of food, pathetic service, shayd hi bartan dhote hoge....Na jao Bhai...waha...daal , chawal bana k kha lo..pls avoid this place.
madarchood hai behn ke loode worker..owner ke na hone pr apne baap ki dukaan smjhte h customers ko thk se hndl ni krte..bs ek hi chej achi hai tawa roti milti hai baki sab bkwaas milta hai
Good food at a great price is what you get here. They need to prioritise orders and maybe introduce some non veg food at some point of time. Otherwise it's a fantastic outlet.
I like this place very much because food are available at reasonable price and service is also good and the main is there is a lot of crowd to make your mood so go there and enjoy the meal .

I had a bad experience with them. ¬†I ordered for the first time and did not get the tiffin. ¬†I was waiting for lunch till 2:30 pm (time promised for arrival was 1:00-1:30). ¬†Everytime I called, the person said, the delivery boy was on the way and will reach in 10 minutes. ¬†Finally at 2:45 pm I called and the person said I could not find the address and now I have reached my home. ¬†He neither informed me that he has cancelled the delivery nor he called even once to ask for location.
Good place for some kerala food. Food is good. Small area..but you can get nice kerala food. Not soo costly. Must try beef fry. Worth especially when you are away from your hometown
Nice South Indian food especially those kerelian dishes and the fish fry they serve for lunch is mouth watering. My weekends are sorted for sure to enhance my taste buds from the daily monotony

I was craving for a homely kerala meal since long, after I landed in Delhi a week back. Thats when my friend took me here. I have to say its quiet a descent place to get kerala meals. The rice, sambar, rasam and all the side dishes are really good. The restaurant is Air conditioned and the tables are also neat. Food also gets served fast. They even have kerala paratha and all the combos that go along with it. If you are craving for a taste of Kerala definitely check out this place.

One of the best South Indian(specially Kerala) food joint in South Delhi region. I had ordered Chicken biriyani and it was good. It was served with salad, kerala pappad and pickle. I tried Kerala porotto also and it was really tasty. This was my first visit so couldn't try anything else, but I would really come here again and I recommend people to try atleast once the food here. They have delivery for food above 300 and even take catering orders. I saw in the last review that the place is not hygienic but it's not so, the place is very clean and it's Air conditioned also. Enjoy the taste of South at reasonable price.

They serve the food from Kerala. A lunch/ dinner won't burn a hole in your pocket. The taste is comparable with that of any small village restaurant in Kerala..  However, the HYGIENE is EXTREMELY POOR. The cooking and work areas really hits the bottom on the hygiene level.  Recently, they have expanded and moved to a new building. They still use the old building as a work area, say for wet grinding, cleaning the fish. By accident I wandered into this building after they have shifted. DISGUSTING. The floor is all dirty, the odd looking guy with poor personal hygiene was stirring with his two hands deep till his elbows in the wet dosa mix. The whole place stunk of rotten fish. That area is like any slum kitchen. Any honest food inspector will close this restaurant down for lack of hygiene without a second thought.  Customers of this restaurant don't care about hygiene because most of them are low income group interested in cheap Kerala style food like beef, fish, tapioca. They are interested in 'Kerala food', not 'good food'.  FOR THE LOVE OF YOUR DIGESTIVE SYSTEM, STAY AWAY FROM THIS RESTAURANT

Chowringhee is a complete fast food house . They serve one of the finest rolls and momos in town. So recently i ordered veg gravy momos , chicken tikka roll and veg momos . So talking about the packaging.  It was very decent the aluminium packaging kept food warm and fresh . So for packaging of the food they are very specific with the things that are provided with it . They had given plates and tissue in packaging. Now talking about the food , so the taste of the food was pretty decent . The quantity and the quality both were top notch and according to the price they are completely value for money . My personal favourite were the chicken tikka roll amazing taste would recommend all to try that once . Soy over alll experience of this place was very decent. So i would recommend to order from here and try out their amazing delicacies.

Have always heard of of chowringhee from my friends so few days back decided to try out this place..I tried some tandoori soya chaap , that was served with green spicy chutney and onion rings , was a bit oily but tasted nice ..I also tried their paneer tikka roll that was stuffed with beautifully marinated flavourful paneer pieces , tasted really nice..The outlet is worth giving a try...

The best place to satisfy your food cravings. Love the variety of dishes here, their amazing flavor and great quantity. The food is hygienic and freshly prepared. Elaborate menu which serves great variety of snacks and lip smacking rolls. I had Double chicken tikka roll, great taste, well cooked chicken, filling was delicious. Loved it Tandoori chaap, it was soft, perfect taste and delicious Paneer malai tikka, fresh and tasty, with tasty green chutney. Tandoori veg momos, drooling, great stuffing and tasty. Overall, I had a great experience here. Highly recommended dishes and great service. A must visit outlet.

Now a days Winters are so freezing that you need lip smacking hot snacks in evening. That's why I ordered Tandoori Veg Momo's from Chowringhee , Sarojini Nagar. As you are clearly see in the picture Momo's look so amazing and Delicious . Momo's were amazing and well cooked . Masala on the top of it was so Chatpata that I wasn't able to control myself from eating more and more . Service was good too . They're pocket friendly as well . If you're around this place then you should definitely give it a try .
osm
excellent
Half biryani should have atleast 5-6 pieces mine had only 3
worst experience ever, the food was pathetic, don't ever buy food from this outlet. The food looks rotten, don't get sick from eating this food, please please don't buy from this point.

Often we order from cake spot and evey time we received value of money cake. This time only fruit cake was not so good because of some points you can see in pictures.  So at the end we love to order on cake spot thanks for making our moments memorable.
I am giving that review on basis of wrong food deliver by them,They have posted Nice pics in Menu but they are providing another product.
Cake was stale and was delivered without the name on top of the cake which i had specially mentioned in the instructions.
Ordered a Red velvet cake for my father's B'day from this place and it was actually very yummy. The taste was so balanced and tasty that we loved it.
he was good
This is a very economical place ,but the food is not upto the mark.Although this place serves a good quantity of food ,however the quality is a little disappointing.

Very delicious Chinese food , I have rated 5 stars . Buy your food from the Krispy kitchen. Very delicious food at a low price .I have ordered Singapore's chowmen and planner mommos it was very good . We can also go there to eat . Thank you
Great noodles! Try singapore or chilli garlic noodles and chilli chicken! Good with home delivery too. Also, chilli potato and sweet corn chicken soup. Great place!

Paneer spring roll are most favourable party of Kristy Kitchen. Served with red and Green sauce just add mouth watering in the mouth of the customer. next specialist is the veg noodle served with chilli sauce.

I ordered veg Noodles...  And let me tell it is just pathetic.  Its too sticky.  I have ordered before and everytime it was quite fine in taste.  But today ohhh god...  It just ruined my dinner.  Like seriously..??  üò†üò†üò† I do not know whether it looks sticky or not but trust me it is..

superbly astonishing and amazing products , providing huge choices of greatness. completely different and unique taste and more importantly it's a healthy stuff..have it once and u would fall in love with the milkshakes .
Wowww awesome taste!!!!...I really like all chocolate flavor and apart from all these things rates are too low.... Amazing product with very low price and completely hygienic..

An amazing place with a variety of delicious shakes . It is very economic and not a burden on pocket. I wonder that still they are providing the best flavors and taste in the segment. All chocolate flavours are so yummy. My personal favorites are mint oreo, peanut butter, choco hazelnut..¬† A must try...
Great tandoori and snack items. I love the enthusiasm of the service staff.
A must visit place if you are love non veg . Highly recommended üëç #thisissodelhi
Rajinder da dhaba, dhaba name is not matter the taste and quality of food is very good. In the beginning of Feb, I had Afghani chicken with very good taste....
Wow taste of mutton.
One of my favourite places for Italian.

food looks terrible... who is the chef, I worked in Chinese section for 6 yrs in your hotel¬†and I moved to USA on 2012. I am working at Ritz Carlton,¬†Washington DC. The presentation of food is terrible bad I saw on your photo. if I get chance I will teach you..

I loved the wood fired pizzas. They were so crusty and crunchy. One of the best pizzas in town and the toppings were adequate to provide a wholesome taste. Keep up the great work. I‚Äôm going to be back so soon

Excellent and outstanding quality of food served at La Piazza. The stewards are kind and polite and also help in choosing truly delicious delecacies from the menu. But on the other hand, the quantity of the food was too less.  Overall, it was a great experience but the dishes are highly priced regarding the quantity of food served.
Excellent Chinese food and lovely setting.
Good food and nice service. A quite place where we can enjoy our food in peace. I tried warm mashroom salad, tofu with chilli, noodles and rice. Mashroom salad was the best.
Absurd delivery prices! Why should customer pay 5 Star Hotel prices for home delivery. Hyatt Regency should reduce prices by 80%
Galouti kababs so goooooodddd... We had chicken Tikka, butter chicken, kababs... Good place, amazing food quality, quick service.. this place is gonna be on my frequent visits place list...
Chicken Barra, malai tikka are the signature orders here but very few people know that chicken curry and rara chicken is something very delicious here.

Placed an order for a dal makhani,mutton barrah and tandoori murgh.the dal makhani was really yum to have but the tandoori murgh was very badly done with salt and spices on the higher side by quite an extent.the deserts were very highly priced, almost at par with some of the vegetable dishes which i felt was way too high
A very highly maintained 'Dhaba' where you can sit back and enjoy your meal (especially, NonVeg). You can either hang out with your friends or with family!

So I went there for the first time with my family and it was a good experience. We went for a Sunday Lunch and ordered Butter Chicken , Rice , and Strawberry shake. Food is tasty, service is great and so as the Ambience . It was a Sunday lunch time so their was a buffet and not much options available for Ala-carte. Strawberry shake was not as tasty as expected. It costs around 6000 for 4 and that's quite reasonable for a 5 star hotel.
You must must MUST try the Nasi Goreng of Cafe. The staff is quick, attentive and very polite.

The food was incredibly bland. We ordered the Ajwain Fish Tikka and a Mutton Biryani. The Fish Tikka had no taste, and the Mutton Biryani was also quite bland. I‚Äôd recommend adding a salan with the biryani, and offering an option for those used to spicier (and hotter) food - I assure you, we exist outside of India too... The service was 5*, but the food was near unpalatable. Therefore, a 2* rating is really being generous.

Food is good. I took a buffet. It was stupendous! I'll give 4 stars out of 5 because the staff made my friend sit on a dirty chair. There was a chewing gum stuck on it and it ruined her pants. Staff was not very responsive and did not help much.

I believe Hyatt Regency has the some of the best restaurants in Delhi and TK's Oriental Grill is one of them. Posh and upscale, it's a great place to hang out and enjoy your meal across the teppanyaki table. We tried the Edamame beans which is a hot favourite. Spicy minced chicken worked just fine with some chilled beer. We ordered grilled Salmon which was an absolute delicacy. Chicken teriyaki with Chef's special rice was our last order for the day and I think we over-ate. It was a pleasure to watch the chef at work and totally enjoyed the evening.

Major disappointment!! Have been coming to Tk's for a while now but this kind of priceyess by the staff is unaccounted for. The restaurant was completely empty and yet we were told that the restaurant is full and there is no space. The food was below average so maybe they shouldn't act so pricey and focus on the quality of food more. The management really needs to be taught well.
Excellent experience. Chef Bhuvan cooked up an amazing array of tasty food for us. Arijit our server made our lunch unforgettable. We have been regulars for years. Keep it up Team TK's!
very good restaurant... also behaviour of the staff is very good.. service is fantastic.. good place to visit with family
Chicken Thupka was too yummy and spicy.. i loved it. I had try this for the first time and i really loved this..good taste and quality of food.

So this was the best place where you can go for chicken steamed momo's as we like only steamed version so I can talk about that only also I do not about other stalls who serves momo's so this was the best for us it was so scrumptious and delicious we loved it, it was pocket friendly as well one can definitely go for this one and trust me you gonna like chutney was damn good. Overall executive was very nice. Ambience:-3/5, Dish:-5/5, staff:-4/5, Cost:-4/5, Hygiene:-4/5 I would definitely recommend this stall to anyone who is reading this.

I was in delhi haat INA for shopping so after shopping i start feeling hungry and visited momo mia.¬† Momo mia has variety of momos in menu. Had veg momos and sweet corn soup. Momos were worth of money but sweet corn soup has disappointed me.
Visited here during recent visit to INA delhi haat. Tried chicken thupka and fruit beer.¬† Chicken thupka was average in taste and it not impressed me. Fruit beer was excellent.
Good amount  Taste was above average  But ambience could have been better

This place is Dilli haat INA serves really fresh and good food. The quality is really good as well as the staff here is polite and helpful. The ambience is really pretty and cozy. We tried veg spring rolls here the presentation was really good and perfect as well as the taste was very good and most importantly it was served fresh. Loved the place
They serve the most delicious chicken Momo's.

So going so many different stalls I. Dilli haat we decided to finish our day with sweet at bengal which didn't turn so well but it's okay, So here we order for rosogulla and sandesh I find that rosogulla was pretty nice outside of Kolkata but sandesh was total disappointment also I have already been to many different bijoli grill for which I habe uploaded the reviews as well and the main problem is they are selling everything very out there in delhi, so I wouldn't recommend this place. Staff:-4/5, Dish:-3/5, ambience:-2/5, cost:-1/5
This is located inside the delhi haat INA.¬† They have ample space for seating.¬† Had fish fry and their thali. Fish fry was excellent in taste but thali was average in taste.¬† Price is mid range.

Must Visit West Bengal Food Stall Bijoli Grill For Vide Varities Of Great Bengali Vegetarian And Non Vegetarian Foods In Delhi Haat INA And Few Locations In New Delhi And Gurgaon In Haryana And Various Places Accross India
The food is pathetic and the restaurant takes a lot of time to get the order ready, the food was too oily
Amazing and fresh food. Must order the special bengali thali if you are looking to try authentic bengali food.. the staff was very polite too.
Nice and authentic misal pav. Similar in taste with maharashtra
I am not satisfied that much and I don't like the service but food is good so I hope whenever I come you improve your restaurant .

A great place to eat and have a snack while chit chatting with your loved ones. Coffee is fantastic and must be tried. Food tastes good and sitting is open so a warm or humid weather may spoil your mood üòë

Dilli haat has my heart cause I belong from Bombay and maharashtrian food is what I crave in Delhi. I came across this Maharashtra food stall and tears fell off my eyes to see VADA PAV. It had authentic maharashtrian flavour and the taste was 5/5. Must visit if and try it out. It‚Äôs pocket friendly and serves you good quantity.
The service was not good and fast. The waiter was too late to take the order. I ordered Farm House Pizza and Oreo Shake. Pizza was good but Shake was not upto the mark.
We ordered Alfredo pasta, Oreo shake, strawberry shake n veg sandwich.pasta was perfectly made n shakes were too awesome. Ambience was the best thing about this outlet.it's a must try!
Good place to hangout with friends. Have been there a couple of times and have never been disappointed with the food and the service. Most of the time it is crowded.
#horrible

Off campus has been a go-to place for me and my friends most of the times that we meet. Beautiful ambience, cozy atmosphere and an amazing rooftop to blow our minds. Most importantly, they serve scrumptious food which attracts us to the cafe every now and then and we've tried most of the items be it chilli mushroom, chilli chicken, chicken tikka, pasta and what not. #offcampus #foodie #satyaniketan

We ordered fresh lime, iced teas and italian smooch.  For starters we had honey chilli potato which could have been a little crispier.  The dal makhni and butter naan were scrumptious though.  We ordered brownie and ice cream as a dessert which turned out to be a mistake as the brownies were so dry.
Nice place and like zomato rider ramesh kumar service
This is an amazing cafe i have celebrated my last bday here....the staff is so polite....ambience is soo gooodd....and the foood is amzinggg ....good music system

They have music to dance spacious . Food is good but needs improvement. As satya niketan is famous for bars and cafes this place can be rated as average. I went on a birthday party with my friends. This place might be good,but when I went there that is on a birthday party the dj was not working and there was dim light. Thanks to the good company wr had otherwise the place would have ruined my friend's birthday.

Satyaniketan as we all it is famous for their cafes and uptown is one of them ,providing a very good quality food with reasonable prices , the pizza was so tasty that i am planning to visit again thereüòç
I loved this place & it is super affordable on the same time food is good too & quantity is enough according to the prices. I celebrated my birthday there & it was actual fun.

Uptown Cafe is a nice place to hang out with your friends. I went here with my whole team to celebrate event success. We ordered so many dishes along with hookaah. We enjoyed a lot and cafe was decent enough and served scrumptious food. Overall it's a nice place and also a pocket friendly place.
Loved this place so much . Chota packet bada dhamaka. Best place to have a good time with friends with pocket friendly menu.

Backbenchers is a cute little cafe in satyaniketan.. Overall, its a nice cafe but it's quite small.. You cannot go their with your big gang..when I went to this cafe the best part was they didnt add any extra charges and their menu was very much affordable..
well organised place and as well as staff quite clean and food is mouth watering worth going thier for weekend vibe and nice place to hangout with friends
Hot abd sour soup. Here the secret is the vegetables well mixed inside the soup. which becomes heavy and fulfilling to take. Well serves with sauce.

Visited this cafe somedays back while I went to satyaniketan. The Ambience was good but I found the food okayish. We had Farmhouse pizza, white sauce pasta and virgin mojito. White sauce wasn't properly cooked and the topping was very less. Farmhouse pizza was a thin crust one and was good.

Veg paneer roll, chicken roll or egg roll are amazing in taste. Tried their steamed momos, tandoori momos also. Pocket friendly rates and its value for money. Very delicious rolls and momos they have. Ordered for team parties too. Highly recommended:)

This is place in a small lane in satya niketan on your left when you enter. They serve delicious rolls and the staff is very cooperative if you want to make changes to your roll. Cheap, student friendly and really yummy. They offer discounts to freshers! Chicken tikka roll-10/10 Chilly paneer roll-9.5/10
Zomato shows more higher prices than the actual prices there is atleast 90 rs. Difference between zomato price and actual price . Not satisfied with it
very nice food and specially dal makhni n chicken rolls are admirable fast service with affordable prices you need to try because nice taste

Yummy rolls and momos. Tandoori momos are worth value and rolls are phenomenal. No wonder they are so popular among students from ages. Rolls start from as cheap as ‚Çπ40 and are stomach filling. Must have and highly recommend.

Even though the place is very pretty, the ambience is very beautiful, the servers are very helpful and polite, the food here is not upto the mark. We tried Pasta, Hot Chocolate and Waffles here, and each dish disappointed us. Not a single one was upto the mark. Will never come here again! Wish they would improve the food since the rest of the things are perfect, except for the most important one. Food!

This place is easy to find and is really good. The staff is attentive and polite. I had Espresso Spritzer in drink which was gooood. Something different. And in food I had chicken strips which were average in taste and quantity. I had this lovely "me" time here.

This cute cafe has something for everyone. Whether you want to have a conversation over coffee, play board games or simply go and read a book. ‚ò∫üìö The cosy interiors, background music along with some delicious food, makes it one of our favourite places in Satya Niketan üíñ
One of my favourite places in satya niketan! You can hang out here for the longest time because of the games it has, the books and the very tasty food it offers! Loved everything I tried :)

DISH NAME- VEG SAMOSEK LEBANESE .THIS DISH WAS DROOLING... DISH NAME - HUMUS PITA , CAN GO FOR A NICE BREAKFAST ... DISH NAME - COTTAGE CHEESE FINGER . . üçü...A PERFECT SNACK TO MUNCH ON DISH NAME - VEG FALAFAL ROLL ....AVERAGE PLACE - 8/10 DECOR- 8.5/10 FOOD -8/10 COST BENEFICIAL-7/10
It is a small compact two floored cafe with dj food is ok interior of cafe is very beautiful,for proper lighting go for second floor

The place has some insane music to keep your feets moving. The food is also amazing. Chicken lollipop, chilli potato were amazing. The mocktails and staff behaviour were also good.I would highly recommend this place to all the foodies visiting Hauz khaz. Cheers.

Punter house is one of the many cafes in the student friendly area of Satya Niketan. The ambience of this place is pretty good. Went to this place for party with friends. We ordered 1. Crispy corn: this was my favorite out of all the dishes we ordered. It was full of flavors. 2. Chilly paneer pizza: the pizza was good, it was quite cheesy. The base was crispy and the topping was also good. 3. Tandoori momos: I love momos, but this was not upto the mark. The filling was very normal and not good for the cafe standards.  4. Red sauce pasta: pasta never dissappoints, it was well cooked with tasty gravy.  Bonus point for having zomato gold ü•á, which makes the outlet even more affordable.

PUNTER HOUSE ‚ù§Ô∏è This place is located near south campus metro station . It has great ambience and especially dj with quite good playlist . The service is lit bit slow but place is budget friendly. Crazy kitchen  This place is located in satya niketan. It has rooftop lounge , dance floor and the ambience is so colourful and catchy. One of the best rooftop lounge.. nice ambiance.. nice crowd.. music was awesome.. perfect rooftop view.. best place to hangout with friends.. must visit placeüòãü•∞ food was goodüòãü•∞

Searching a great cafe with a great seating area and attractive ambiance? Then trust me crazy kitchen is the place to look for. This cafe is among one of the most popular cafes in satyaniketan. The ambiance is really really great. The attractive and eye-catchy wall decors all over the place really took my heart. The design and theme of decoration is really superb and the lighting you get at this place is top notch which really makes your time at crazy kitchen memorable. Talking about food we had here: In new additions we tried peri peri sauce chicken and peri peri sauce momos. ‚ù§Ô∏è Both the dishes were great and the presentation was also good. Then we tried the most constant dish at this place which is the chiken parantha. The taste was as good as always and really enjoyed each and every bit of it. ‚ù§Ô∏è Also got my hands on creamy chilli chicken and some hot drums of heaven with my favourite coke. ‚ù§Ô∏è The food at this place is the best among all the cafe I tried in satyaniketan. What i love about this place is that they serve complimentary sheesha if you want on a certain bill amount due to which this place becomes a great one to spend time with your gang. Overall experience at crazy kitchen is really superb and I personally visit this place often. So do try this cafe and make your time memorable and special. #MustVisit #MustTry #ChickenParantha #ChilliChicken #Sheesha #Rooftop #PeriPeriChicken #DrumsOfHeaven #GreatPlace #TopNotchAmbiance

Crazy kitchen I went there at night, a month ago. So this is the cafe with rooftop. I like the concept of sitting on floor . It's very comfortable really . Cold breeze I ordered main course Butter naan and paneer which was good. Pocket friendly cafe. Mustgo.
Celebrated a friend's birthday here. it was a nice experience. The food is good and so is the ambience.

The food is average. I have visited here couple of times but in the starting the staff was good and friendly but as the time went and i visited again again with my group they started serving us late and the behaviour of staff towards us was not professional.

I ordered pasta and healthy stuff like veggie grilled sandwich the food was healthy and tasty. So i recommend you guys you can try for sure!

Superb joint for evening knick knacks. You name it they have it. Ike burger is my favourite here coupled with a masala chai, yes omelette with chai. You will probably like this combo only here. Pasta is quite nice for you to try, the list is endless

The chai was delivered hot and was quite refreshing, so no complaints there. Why I give 3 stars to my experience: The Baked Nachos with Cheese was slightly singed on the sides, plus the cheese seemed a bit off, odor-wise. As for the Cheesy Fries, they weren't too bad. So, okay experience overall.

This place in satyaniketan is one of the favorite spot of college student. Whenever you visit this place you'll see college students hanging out or doing their work. They use to have smoking area outside for all the people who like to smoke and have tea but it's prohibited now.  Chai story- the thing which makes this place a lot better for me is it's ambience. This place gives a total homely vibe with a good brunch menu. Their famous cutting chai and khulhad chai are good to go for, they serve good shakes and ice tea as well. I like their Maggie and fries too. You can always hit this place whenever you are in a mood for tea and some conversation or if you are looking for a peaceful atmosphere to read your unfinished novel.
Tasty momos available with varieties... But I would say the place is a bit expensive for momos in a place like Delhi where we get cheap tasty momos everywhere

It is a very cosy place in Satya Niketan with seating for max 10-12 people. The staff is really very friendly here.The unique combination of burger and momos interested me and therefore I orgered one Veggie Moburg. It went good with coke and I liked the unique match. Would definitely have it again.
I really like momos from wow cos of their hygienic preparation. taste- 4 not so heavy on pocket. Personal fav- momos burger. totally recommend it.

I have ordered steamed chicken momos which were gummy, soaked in water couldn‚Äôt eat..  it went completely into dustbin.. I have also ordered tandoori momos which were ok to taste but I seriously doubt the hygiene as I have a stomach ache n diarrhea after eating them... worst experience ever...

My friend and I order takeout from this restaurant at least every other weekend.  Their chicken fried momos are delicious and generously portioned without being overpriced and the staff are friendly and efficient.  Our food has always been ready by time and the packing is nice.

Have had their best selling pizza. I tried soya pizza and mushroom pizza both were palatable, and the best thing -each was for 50 bucks, although it worth more than this. It‚Äôs a village themed cafe with amazing food , hukkah and ambiance at great pocket friendly price .  There is just a con that it‚Äôs menu is very limited , this can be improved. My personal favourite was baked nachos ‚ù§Ô∏è It‚Äôs worth giving a try .

The interior and ambience is great just like a 'kasba' and this cafe have totally followed the theme. Service is great... Great place to hangout with friends and family.... Value for moneyüëå.... We had burgers and pizzas and in drinks -Brownie shake and that was just awesomeüíûüíû..... Overall a well day spent here....‚úåüòç Will recommend this place to my friends and familyüôã‚úå.

If you are finding a place to hang out with your friends cafe kazbaah will surely meet your expectations. Its ambiance attracts people mostly youth and food is also above average , prices are surprisingly affordable too. Nice place to hangout must visit

Ambience: okay not that good. Sanitation : no complains regarding that! Food : not really that tasty,  especially pasta ranges are disappointing But some of the dishes are fine.  Prices : worthy!  Service : slow service,  i must say,  not happy with it.

Hideous cafe, this place had nothing at all in terms of an experience. The food couldn't be any worse. The ambience, there wasn't any to talk about and there was no one except us still they managed to ruin the food.

Awesome interior, amazing food. Value for moneyüòä Ordered a butter chicken masala, Hyderabadi chicken biryani and a naan. It was just awesome üòÄ A must visit place to visit with family and friends. Service and quality of food is very good.

As we entered on a Monday evening this place was absolutely empty. Therefore I do not understand that the waiter was insisting on us sitting on a different table then we choose. (No reservation sign). I'm giving low score for customer service.

This place is one of the good place you can visit in whole of the Satyaniketan. The ambiance is very pleasing and warm hugging. Music in background provides perfect environment for spending time with special ones and friends. I tried out their- ‚Ä¢Dahi Kebab - They were good to have, filled in with fresh hung curd and the flavours were on point. ‚Ä¢NHC Spl. Pizza - This is one of their special menu dish, which you must try if you are visiting it. The cheesy pizza was absolutely worth every penny. ‚Ä¢Cheese Nachos - Hell of the loaded nachos all with right amount of stuffings and cheese were good to have. ‚Ä¢Virgin Mojito - The most optimum drink you can have anywhere and you can ever decide the whole lot of their drinks menu with a single drink, Virgin Mojito. ‚Ä¢Brownie Shake - Being a chocolaty shake lover, I never fail to try shakes anywhere. This one was brilliant and quite thick as it should be. All of them were nicely prepared and price is quite affordable too.

One of the few places in Noida which offers a fine dining experience as offered by this restaurant. The ambience is nice and menu tempting. Both the starters and the main course offers good choices and the Liquor section although have limited choices but the serving is nice. Visit here to satisfy  the Chinese taste buds of your mouth.Price for a meal for two without drinks are approx Rs.1000.

I'd say this place is an institute of Delhi now. Old as hell and there no dip in quality. They have upped their game with their new high tech menus. As a kid I always wanted a menu in which I could see all the dishes before I order anything. One of the best family restaurants for Chinese in Delhi.

Been to this place a couple of time.  Food - loved noodles n my hubby loved prawn dishes. We ordered Duck as well, wasn't that great.   Ambience - very nice n like little china Service - very good   Price - decent enough for the quality of food they serve  If u love chinese food then its a must visit . Cheers!

One of the best restaurants serving near to authentic Chinese üà∂ food. Quality is a constant across locations and geography. A must visit place. The only thing which keeps a star ‚≠ê away though is the price. It's a bit overpriced considering the food, portion size, ambience and customer service.
The ambience is pretty good and the food is mind blowing and authentic. Have been there many times and it has never disappointed me. Singapore Chilli Prawns and Drums of heaven are worth trying!!!!

This place SUCKS!  It serves frozen foods with rotten chicken.  The taste is not at all good.  The waiters did a big mistake by serving non veg to my vegetarian friend.  The specialities in the menu seems to be the worst food I have ever had  A simple Soup are also seems to be not fresh.

I went with my friends for lunch, they have huge place to party or to have fun, decent ambiance with 2floor space both floor they have bar counters. We ordered some drinks (Sangrias and beer) and some main courses, we ordered mix sauce pasta, which tastes one of best I have tried, brilliant with some garlic breads, grilled fish (basa fish) served fresh veggies and butter sauce also tastes good. Overall tastes were really good food, go for Sangrias (preferance white wine). Good service, decent ambiance, decent amount.

Basically a disco place with a large dance floor... Nice music both Desi and Videsi  Food is good and portions are big  College crowd. .. not for families  Won't be back!!! Atleasf for a while..   ;-)

Had to been to this restaurant recently, the ambience was good with friendly (not so over bothering) waitors . There was this live band playing soft music. We had pasta in arrabbiata sauce, as the name suggests it had the spiciness of chili peppers that left a good after taste in the mouth, the chicken was nice and tender and the drinks were also phenomenal. Will recommend this place if you want to laze away from the Delhi crowd on a saturday night with some good music and great food.
Nice ambience, awesome food... Located in gk Good service Well decorted indoor & outdoor seating  Good sheesha as well...  We like visit again soon...
Delicious!! One of my go-to restaurants in Delhi!

What I ordered was spinach fatayer and what I received was some kind of deep fried spinach cutlets. This is really disappointing especially when you pick and choose a special dish you‚Äôre craving for. What‚Äôs the point of posting a picture if you‚Äôre just going to deliver whatever you feel like?
Worst Turkish,Lebanese food I ever had in my life Seafood Soups smells like rotten egg. Half cooked Meat platter. Overall pls never visit this place .

Lets first talk about there ambience.  Baris is the bliss in this Delhi's busy and hectic life. It away from any kind of hustle and bustle. You will definitely take a pause here with the drag of hookah. Yeah, they serve hookah(sheesh) but that is really expensive. I am in love with the ambience of this place, especially at night. They are close to fine dining as they have really royal Arabic kind of restaurant but the thing that exclude them from other restaurants cum cafe genre is there "rooftop". I love how they have created an aura with bamboo seats and dim lighting. You really feel good there. Baris is my happy palace when I want to have a silent evening with me or with my pals over the smoke of hookah flavours.  Now discuss the core, The food. I have some mix reviews about there food. So I forcefully suggest everyone to try only there the Mediterranean and Middle Eastern dishes. They are master of that taste. Like there dish name as "Hummus bin dujaj" you love it if haven't tried Turkish cuisine. Their kabab are mouth-watering like "tavuk kiyma kebab". They have a drink name as "Frozen Baris" I have that drink every time I go down there, its really different kind of Mocktail. They have Indian cuisine too but if you are there to eat Indian please go to any Dhaba they will serve you much better in respect of taste.¬†  Visit Baris only for Turkish food.¬†  That's my review. Hazoor kha kr to dikahye.
I have tried many dishes  from this place almost every dish is good and tasty. Taste and quantity both parameters are appropriate of this place.
Went to this place night with friends .. i really liked this place... everything was good at this place... food was awesome , staff is also very nice... want to visit again at this place....

We called up the restaurant and asked to book table for 8 specifically at 'Fitoor' after confirming the music they are playing sunday night and on which the manager informed that its Bollywood night. so now we reach at the restaurant and on the entrance the manger informs us -Fitoor me private party chal rahi hai and aapki table hume ground floor pe book kari hai wo b humara he hai named CDB cafe.  when we are explained that the specifications given to us was of Fitoor which is on first floor they dint let us enter and the bouncer 'with gutka in his mouth threatened us ''side ho jao'' I have never seen such sort hospitality anywhere. Best part was when called the guy who took our booking on the call, he came with a drink glass in his hand and he was high in his own world. I would never suggest anyone for this place.  We are happy that post this we found the cafe 'The heroes bistro and bar' they made our evening great after such bad expeerience

Giani is one of the biggest ice cream chain in delhi ncr.¬† During recent visit i tried Hot Chocolate Fudge and Brownie Sundae. Hot Chocolate Fudge was one of the best i had tried in recent time, Brownie Sundae was average in taste.

Regret to give 1 star rating as there was no option to give -1! Being a regular in ordering through Zomato, trying out new dishes, almost 4 times a week, I thought of checking out this one.
